f.d: rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha a ba tang sa ka nA ma ma hA bai pu l+yaM sU tra/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/
The Flower Ornament Scripture A Translation of the Avatamsaka Sutra Thomas Cleary
[1. 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba'i le'u]
BOOK ONE. The Wonderful Adornments of the Leaders of the Worlds
bam po dang po/
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
THUS HAVE I HEARD. At one time

bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyi sku mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skus shin tu khyab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung gi nga ro shin tu bsgrags pa/ nam mkha' dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid mnyam pa nyid du rab tu snang ba'i spyod yul can/ nam mkha' ltar 'gro ba thams cad kun khyab pa'i snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa'i sku/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad kyi nang na rnam par snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar shar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba bstan pa rab tu spros pa/ dus gsum gyi bsod nams rgya chen po rgya mtsho lta bus spyod yul yongs su dag pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba/

At that time, the Buddha, the World Honored One, in this setting, attained to supreme, correct awareness of all things. His knowledge entered into all times with complete equanimity; his body filled all worlds; his voice universally accorded with all lands in the ten directions. Like space, which contains all forms, he made no discrimination among all objects. And, as space extends everywhere, he entered all lands with equanimity. His body forever sat omnipresent in all sites of enlightenment. Among the host of enlightening beings, his awesome light shone clearly, like the sun emerging, illumining the world. The ocean of myriad virtues which he practiced in all times was thoroughly pure, and he constantly demonstrated the production of all the buddha-lands, their boundless forms and spheres of light extending throughout the entire cosmos, equally and impartially.

chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsgribs pa med pa/ skra'i rtse mo thams cad du mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par 'phrul ba byin gyis rlob pa'i mthu mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon du gyur par yongs su ston pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'phos pa med par gshegs pa; yongs su ston pas khyab par mdzad pa/ dngos po med pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa; 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad du dus gsum rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bskal pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyi rlabs shin tu bsgrubs pa/

He expounded all truths, like spreading great clouds. Each of his hairtips was able to contain all worlds without interference, in each manifesting immeasurable spiritual powers, teaching and civilizing all sentient beings. His body extended throughout the ten directions, yet without coming or going. His knowledge entered into all forms and realized the emptiness of things. All the miraculous displays of the Buddhas of past, present, and future, were all seen in his light, and all the adornments of inconceivable eons were revealed.

yul ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dgon pa snying po byang chub rdo rje rin po che thams cad ltar gzhom du mi choms par sra ba'i sa phyogs nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gis sa gzhi brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po dri ma med par 'bar bas rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che mang po thams cad kyis rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa; yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer dang / sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / dra ba mang po thams cad rnam par bres pa/ rin po che'i kha dog zad mi shes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu bsgrubs pa/ me tog sna tshogs chu bo'i klong lta bu yongs su bstan pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing 'od zer gyi kha dog stug po dang ldan pa'i yal gas brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad du snang ba shin tu 'bar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa/

the Buddha was in the land of Magadha, in a state of purity, at the site of enlightenment, having just realized true awareness. The ground was solid and firm, made of diamond, adorned with exquisite jewel discs and myriad precious flowers, with pure clear crystals. The ocean of characteristics of the various colors appeared over an infinite extent. There were banners of precious stones, constantly emitting shining light and producing beautiful sounds. Nets of myriad gems and garlands of exquisitely scented flowers hung all around. The finest jewels appeared spontaneously, raining inexhaustible quantities of gems and beautiful flowers all over the earth. There were rows of jewel trees, their branches and foliage lustrous and luxuriant. By the Buddha’s spiritual power, he caused all the adornments of this enlightenment site to be reflected therein.

yang dag par bstan pa'i sa'i snying po rin po che'i 'bru thams cad 'byung bas phyogs kun tu dpyangs shing brgyan pa'i snying po byang chub la byang chub chen po'i shing nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'brus bsgrubs pa'i sdong po dang ldan pa/ bai DUr+ya dang nor bu thams cad kyi rigs 'byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i lhun can/ yongs su yon tan mang po mtha' yas pa'i nor bu rin po che mang po'i 'brus shin tu brgyan cing rab tu 'phel ba'i yal ga can/ rin po che thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'od gsal bas phyogs kyi sprin du gyur pa/ yal ga thams cad kyi rtse mo las me tog dang 'bras bu'i dra ba yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs can rab tu dpyangs pa/ rin po che'i 'bras bu sna tshogs shin tu 'bar ba'i snying pos shing gi rgyan me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas shing rnam par gsal ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che rgya che zhing mang ba'i 'od zer lta bur rnam par snang ba/ nor bu'i yon tan zad mi shes pa'i char chen po rnam par sprul pa'i 'od yongs su bstan pa/ nor bu'i sgo thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprin 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /

The tree of enlightenment was tall and outstanding. Its trunk was diamond, its main boughs were lapis lazuli, its branches and twigs were of various precious elements. The leaves, spreading in all directions, provided shade, like clouds. The precious blossoms were of various colors, the branching twigs spread out their shadows. Also the fruits were jewels containing a blazing radiance. They were together with the flowers in great arrays. The entire circumference of the tree emanated light; within the light there rained precious stones, and within each gem were enlightening beings, in great hosts like clouds, simultaneously appearing.

byin gyi rlabs kyis zad mi shes pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba'i drung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang phyogs thams cad du mngon par snang ba rab tu 'phel ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs yon tan mtha' yas pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ lhun rin po che'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa; rgyan mtha' yas pas shin tu klubs pa'i 'od zer snang bas sprin ltar khebs pa/ pho brang gi mtshams thams cad nas 'od kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bkye ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rjes su 'dod pa'i snying po can/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung rgya chen po'i dbyangs dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'i dra bas thams cad yog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa'i 'phrul pa dmigs pa thams cad du byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi khyim gyi gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa/

Also, by virtue of the awesome spiritual power of the Buddha, the tree of enlightenment constantly gave forth sublime sounds speaking various truths without end. The palace chamber in which the Buddha was situated was spacious and beautifully adorned. It extended throughout the ten directions. It was made of jewels of various colors and was decorated with all kinds of precious flowers. The various adornments emanated lights like clouds; the masses of their reflections from within the palace formed banners. A boundless host of enlightening beings, the congregation at the site of enlightenment, were all gathered there: by means of the ability to manifest the lights and inconceivable sounds of the Buddhas, they fashioned nets of the finest jewels, from which came forth all the realms of action of the spiritual powers of the Buddhas, and in which were reflected images of the abodes of all beings.
sems skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas par khyab par 'phro ba'i snying po can/
Also, by virtue of the aid of the spiritual power of the Buddha, they embraced the entire cosmos in a single thought.

seng+ge'i khri chen po sangs rgyas kyi gdan du gyur pa/ rin po che thams cad dang / yid du 'ong ba'i spos sna tshogs kyi snying po can/ pad+mo'i dra ba 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung bas brtan pa/ rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'khor lo'i 'od kun tu bdal ba/ me tog gi phreng ba bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas klubs pa/ nor bu'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las 'od shin tu bkye ba/ rta babs dang / khri 'phang dang / skar khung dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa/

Their lion seats were high, wide, and beautiful. The bases were made of jewels, their nets of lotus blossoms, their tableaus of pure, exquisite gemstones. They were adorned with various flowers of all colors. Their roofs, chambers, steps, and doors were adorned by the images of all things. The branches and fruits of jewel trees surrounded them, arrayed at intervals.

nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po'i sprin thams cad du 'phros pa'i rgyan can/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya chen po'i gtsug gi rin po ches bzung zhing 'od zer rnam par snang ba/ phyogs bcu'i mtshams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi snying po'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi sgra dbyangs rgya chen pos chos kyi dbyings khyab pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa la bzhugs shing /

Clouds of radiance of jewels reflected each other: the Buddhas of the ten directions conjured regal pearls, and the exquisite jewels in the topknots of all the enlightening beings all emanated light, which came and illuminated them.
Furthermore, sustained by the spiritual power of all Buddhas, they expounded the vast perspective of the Enlightened Ones, their subtle tones extending afar, there being no place they did not reach.

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thabs cig tu spyod spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig ste/
'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'bar ba seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi

There were great enlightening beings numerous as the atoms in ten buddha-worlds surrounding him.
Their names were: Universally Good (Samantabhadra), Light of the Supreme Lamp of Universal Virtue, Lion Banner of Universal Light, Subtle Light of Flames of Universal Jewels, Banner of Oceans of Qualities of Universal Sounds, Realm of Enlightenment of Radiance of Universal Knowledge, Banner of Flowers of a Topknot of Universal Jewels, Pleasing Voice of Universal Awareness, Light of Inexhaustible Virtue of Universal Purity, Mark of Universal Light, Great Brilliance of the Light of the Moon Reflected in the Ocean, Undefiled Treasury of Light of Oceans of Cloudlike Sounds, Born of Wisdom and Adorned with Virtue, Great Light of Sovereign Virtue, Brave Lotus Topknot, Sun Banner of Clouds of Universal Knowledge, Greatly Persevering with Indestructible Courage, Light Banner of Fragrant Flames, Deep Beautiful Sound of Great Enlightened Virtue, Born of Wisdom with the Light of Great Virtue. These and others were the leaders—there were as many as there are atoms in ten buddha-worlds.

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig gis byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'khor yongs su rgyas pas snang ba gyur pa; ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings thams cad du snang bas gsal bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag pas snang bar gyur pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho yangs shing zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang mthus snang bar byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar brtsam pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis snang bar byas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa; sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo'i yul yangs pa la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis snang bar byas pa/ sa gcig las byung ba yongs su gnon pa'i rjes su 'brang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ smon lam gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes thams cad kyi gnas pas snang bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa yongs su shes pas snang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rjes su brtags pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa kun tu 'od kyi dbyings dang gnas su rnam par spyod du dbang ba/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i sgo thams cad du rnam par rgyu bas snang bar gyur pa/ ye shes snang ba thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la shin tu gnas pa/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa dang / yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor gtogs pa thams cad kyis khyab par byed pa'i lus can/ smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sbyor ba la phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par dpa' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing snying po byang chub tu nye bar 'dong ba yang dag par ston pa/ kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtshos sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi shes pa yongs su rgyas par 'grengs pa'i lus can rnams dang thabs cig go/

These enlightening beings had all in the past accumulated roots of goodness along with Vairocana Buddha, and were all born from the ocean of roots of goodness of the Buddha.
They had already fulfilled the various means of transcendence, and their wisdom eye was thoroughly clear. They observed all times with impartiality. They were thoroughly purified in all states of concentration. Their eloquence was oceanic, extensive and inexhaustible. They possessed the qualities of buddhahood, were dignified and honorable. They knew the faculties of sentient beings, and taught them according to potential and necessity. They entered into the matrix of the cosmos, their knowledge was nondiscriminatory; they experienced the liberation of the Buddhas, exceedingly deep and immensely vast. They were able to enter into one stage, according to technical expediency, yet maintain the virtues of all stages, supported by the ocean of all vows, always accompanied by wisdom, throughout the future. They had thoroughly comprehended the rarely-attained, vast secret realm of all Buddhas. They were familiar with the equal teachings of all Buddhas. They were already treading the Buddhas’ ground of universal light. They entered the doors of boundless oceans of concentrations. They manifested bodies in all places and participated in worldly activities. Their memory power was enormous, and they assembled the ocean of all the teachings. With intelligence, eloquence, and skill they turned the wheel which never turns back. The vast ocean of virtuous qualities of all Buddhas entered entirely into their bodies. They went willingly to all the lands in which there were Buddhas. They had already made offerings to all Buddhas, over boundless eons, joyfully and tirelessly. In all places when the Buddhas attained enlightenment, they were always there, approaching them and associating with them, never giving up. Always, by means of the vows of universal goodness and wisdom, they caused the wisdom-body of all sentient beings to be fulfilled. They had perfected innumerable such virtues.

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag na rdo rje dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od dang / lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od dang / lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs dang / lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba dang / lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba dang / lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs dang / lag na rdo rje seng+ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po'i dpal gyi mig dang / lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad+mo 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par smon pas zham 'bring na 'brang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ dge ba dang bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yangs pa la rnam par spyod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas pa khong du chud pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i lus can/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du lus shin tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyi 'phrul ba rjes su rtogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang / gnas srung pa la shin tu brtson pa rnams dang thabs cig go/

There were also present thunderbolt-bearing spirits, as numerous as atoms in a buddha-world, known as Demigod of Wonderful Form, Banner of Swiftness of the Sun, Light of the Flowers of the Polar Mountain, Pure Sound of Clouds, Sublime Faculties, Delightful Light, Sound of Thunder in Great Trees, Lion King Light, Auspicious Eye of Intense Flames, Jewel Topknot of Lotus Light; these were the leaders, and there were as many of them as there are atoms in a buddha-world. All of them had constantly invoked great vows over countless past eons, vowing to always draw near to and serve the Buddhas. Their practices in accord with their vows had already reached fulfillment, and they had reached the other shore. They had accumulated boundless pure good works. They had clearly arrived at all the realms of meditative absorption, and had attained spiritual powers. They dwelled wherever a Buddha was, and entered into the realm of inconceivable liberation; taking their place in the assembly, their dignified light stood out. They manifested their bodies according to the needs of sentient beings and thereby pacified them. Wherever there were manifestations of Buddhas, they all went there magically. Wherever the Buddhas dwelt, they always diligently guarded and protected the place.

lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od dang / 'od zer phyogs su snang ba dang sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / rgyan bzang po me tog gtsug phud dang / spyod yul mtha' yas dpal dang / snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal dang / spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa'i 'od dang / srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa dang / sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig dang / khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od dang / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha de dag la sogs pa kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur bar smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig go /

There were also multiple-body spirits, numerous as atoms in a buddha-world, known as Flower Topknot Adornment, Light Illumining All Directions, Oceanic Sound Conquering, Pure Flower Adorned Topknot, Infinite Dignified Postures, Array of Supreme Light, Fragrant Clouds of Pure Light, Guardian Sustainer, Ubiquitious Shepherd, Immutable Light. These were the leaders; there were as many as there are atoms in a buddha-world. They had all in the past fulfilled great vows and had provided for and served all the Buddhas.

rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya dang / rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang / rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa dang / rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa dang / rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa dang / rkang gis 'gro shing tsan+dan gyi 'od dang / rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang / rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od dang / rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor dang / de dag la sogs pa rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sha stag dang thabs cig go/

Also there were footstep-following spirits, numerous as atoms in a buddha-world. Their leaders were known as Precious Symbol, Lotus Light, Topknot of Pure Flowers, Embodying All Beautiful Visions, Exquisite Gem Star Banner, Joyfully Uttering Sublime Sounds, Sandalwood Tree Light, Lotus Luminosity, Subtle Light, Collection of Fine Flowers, and so on. Over innumerable past ages they had all associated with Buddhas, always following them.

snying po byang chub kyi lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig dang / 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug phud dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / mthu dam pa spos kyi mig dang / rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / pad+mo shing snang ba'i 'od dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa snying po byang chub kyi lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon sangs rgyas rgya cher mchod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dag par byung ba sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also sanctuary spirits, as numerous as atoms in a buddha-world. Their leaders were known as Banner of Pure Adornments, Polar Mountain Jewel Light, Sign of the Thunder Banner, Wonderful Eyes Raining Flowers, Garland Light Topknot, Raining Jewel Arrays, Courageous Fragrant Eye, Diamond-Colored Cloud, Lotus Light, Radiance of Ineffable Light, and so on. All of them had in the past met innumerable Buddhas, perfected their will power, and brought forth extensive offerings.

nam mkha'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba dang / rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba dang / slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong bas rnam par snang ba dang / sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig dang / 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba dang / bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od dang / lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan dang / grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang rab tu brgyan pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also city spirits, as numerous as atoms in a buddha-world. Their leaders were known as Jewel Peak Radiance, Beautifully Adorned Palace, Jewel of Pure Joy, Sorrowless Purity, Flower Lamp Flame Eyes, Flame Banner Clearly Showing, Light of Virtue, Pure Light, Fragrant Topknot Adornment, Beautiful Jewel Light, and so on. All of them had, over innumerable, inconceivable eons, adorned the mansions in which the Buddhas stayed.

sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa'i dri ma med pa dang / bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od dang / shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / sems rin po che rgyas pa dang / dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa dang / gser gyi mig gi dpal dang / spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa dang / sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa dang / me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyun dang / sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang bsod nams kyi dbyings gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang rab tu 'brel ba sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also earth spirits, as numerous as atomic particles in a buddha-world. Their leaders were known as Pure Flower of Universal Virtue, Adornment of Stable Blessings, Beautiful Flower Adorned Tree, Universal Distributor of Treasures, Pure Eye Observing the Season, Beautiful Supreme Eye, Fragrant Hair Emitting Light, Pleasing Sound, Curled Topknot of Beautiful Flowers, Diamond-Adorned Body, and so on. They had all in the past made profound, grave vows, vowing to always associate with the Buddhas and cultivate the same virtuous acts.

ri'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa dang / nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud dang / kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud dang / snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od dang / stobs la thub pa med pas snang ba'i 'od dang / kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor dang / kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig dang / ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig dang / de dag la sogs pa ri'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang tshul dri ma med pa'i mig gi sgo rab tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable mountain spirits, led by such as Jewel Peak Blooming Flower, Flower Forest Beautiful Topknot, Lofty Banner Shining Everywhere, Undefiled Jewel Topknot, Light Illumining All Directions, Light of Great Power, Awesome Light Conquering All, Light-Orb of Subtle Intensity, Universal Eye Clearly Seeing, Adamantine Eye of Mystery. They had all attained pure eyes in regarding all things.

nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang / lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal dang / yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid dang / dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs dang / sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang / kun nas spos mang po ldang ba'i 'od dang / kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang 'bras bu dang ro'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang dga' ba'i shugs mtha' yas pas gsal bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also an inconceivable number of forest spirits, led by such spirits as Spreading Flowers Like Clouds, Outstanding Trunk Unfolding Light, Bearing Branches Emitting Radiance, Auspicious Pure Leaves, Draped Flame Treasury, Pure Light, Pleasant Thunder, Light and Fragrance All-Pervading, Subtle Light Shining Far, Flowers and Fruits Savoring of Light, and so on. They all had infinite pleasing glows.

sman gyi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa dang / tsan+dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba dang / 'od rdul med pa dang / ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba dang / mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba dang / sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang / phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba dang / sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig dang / de dag la sogs pa sman gyi lha mtha' yas pa kun kyang snying rje dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable herb spirits, led by such as Auspicious, Sandalwood Forest, Pure Light, Universal Renown, Radiant Pores, Universal Purifier, Roarer, Banner of Light Outshining the Sun, Seeing in All Directions, Energy-Augmenting Clear Eyes, and so on. Their natures were all free from defilement, and they helped beings with kindness and compassion.

lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lo tog gi lha 'jam pa'i dpal dang / dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od dang / rtsal dam pa'i stobs dang / mdangs kyi ngad mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sa kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu dang / gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs dang / yal ga dri ma med par grub pa dang / spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa dang / bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba dang / lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa kun kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa shin tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable crop spirits, led by such spirits as Gentle Superb Flavor, Pure Light of Seasonal Flowers, Physical Strength Courage and Health, Increasing Vitality, Everywhere Producing Roots and Fruits, Wonderfully Adorned Circular Topknot, Moistening Pure Flowers, Developing Wonderful Fragrance, Liked by All Who See, Undefiled Pure Light. All of them had attained perfection of great joyfulness.

chu klung gi lha mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa dang / ri dang chu kun la brten pa dang / rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / nga ros khyab par byed pa dang / srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa dang / gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa dang / dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba dang / yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba dang / chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi lha mu med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i don du yid la byed pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable river spirits, led by such spirits as Everywhere Producing Swift Currents, Universally Purifying Springs and Streams, Dustfree Pure Eye, Roaring Everywhere, Rescuing Sentient Beings, Heatless Pure Light, Universally Causing Joy, Supreme Banner of Extensive Virtue, Light Shining on All Worlds, Light of Oceanic Virtues. All of them diligently concentrated on benefiting living beings.

rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal dang / rdo rje kun nas sra zhing mi choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa dang / rdul dang dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa dang / kun nas chu dang / ri bo dang / khyim gyi dkyil 'khor dang / skyabs rin po che'i mig gi zla ba'i dpal dang / klu'i dpal pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / chu lta bur ro mthun pa 'dzin pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od dang / ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs dang / de dag la sogs pa rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i mthar phyin par rgyas par byed pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable ocean spirits, led by such spirits as Producing Jewel Light, Diamond Banner, Undefiled, Palaces in All Waters, Auspicious Jewel Moon, Beautiful Flower Dragon Topknot, Everywhere Holding the Flavor of Light, Jewel Flame Flower Light, Beautiful Diamond Topknot, Thunder of the Ocean Tide. They had all filled their bodies with the great ocean of virtues of the Buddhas.

me'i lha grangs med pa dag dag yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od dang / kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa dang / gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud dang / dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig gi dpal dang / phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab kyi spo dang / 'od drag shul can gyi dbang phyug dang / mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa dang / me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug dang / de dag la sogs pa me'i lha grangs med pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba sel ba'i snang ba ston pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also countless fire spirits, led by such spirits as Repository of Flames of Universal Light, Banner of Universal Assembly of Light, Great Light Shining Everywhere, Palace of Wonders, Inexhaustible Light Topknot, Eyes of Various Flames, Palaces in All Directions Like Polar Mountains, Sovereign of Awesome Light, Light Destroying the Darkness, Thunder and Lightning. All of them manifested various kinds of light, causing the irritations of sentient beings to vanish.

chu'i phung po'i lha tshad med pa dag dang lang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar chu'i phung po'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin sgra'i shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin dang chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / bzang por 'khyil ba grub pa'i dpal dang / kun nas spos dri ma med pa'i myu gu'i dpal dang / dba' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams stegs kyi 'od dang / tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba dang / 'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa dang / chu'i phung po'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi nga ro'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa chu'i phung po'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i skyabs su brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable water spirits, led by such spirits as Ubiquitous Cloud Banner, Cloudlike Sound of the Ocean Tide, Beautiful Round Topknot, Whirlpool of Skills, Store of Undefiled Fragrance, Virtue Bridge Light Sound, Freedom of Contentment, Good Sound of Pure Joy, Everywhere Manifesting Awesome Light, Roaring Sound Filling the Sea. They always diligently strived to rescue and protect all beings.

rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od dang / kun tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i mthu'i dpal dang / kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang po'i 'od dang / chu drag po'i snying po skem pa dang / sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs dang / shing gi rtse mo'i me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang / thogs pa med par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba dang / rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / rlung gi phung po'i lha 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa kun nas snang bar byed pa dang / de dag la sogs pa rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i nga rgyal rnam par gtor ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable wind spirits, led by such spirits as Unimpeded Light, Everywhere Manifesting Courageous Action, Wind Striking Cloud Banner, Arrays of Light, Power Able to Dry Up Water, Great Voice Howling Everywhere, Tree Branch Hanging Topknot, Unimpeded Wherever It Goes, Various Mansions, Great Light Shining Everywhere. They all worked to dispel the mentality of conceit.

nam mkha'i lha mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / mtha' yas shing zab pa kun tu rgyas par byed pa dang / rlung kun nas 'byung ba'i dpal dang / bsgribs pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / rgya chen po kun tu gnon pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / 'od zer snang ba'i 'od thogs pa med pa dang / stobs kyi rgyun thogs pa med pa'i dpal dang / phyogs dri ma med par snang ba'i 'od dang / dbyangs shin tu 'phags shing zab pa dang / nam mkha'i lha phyogs bcur mngon du ston pa'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i lha mu med pa thams cad kyang sems rgya mtsho dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable space spirits, led by such spirits as Pure Light Shining All Around, Traveling Everywhere Deeply and Extensively, Producing Auspicious Wind, Abiding Securely Beyond Obstruction, Broad Steps and Beautiful Topknot, Unhindered Light Flames, Unobstructed Conquering Power, Spotless Light, Deep and Far-Reaching Sublime Sound, All-Pervading Light. Their minds were all free from defilement, broad, vast, clear, and pure.

phyogs kyi lha mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / mnyas pa nyid la mngon du lta ba dang / snang ba spyod pa'i rgyan dang / kun tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i gtsug yongs su 'grub pa dang / nam mkha'i rgyud kun tu spyod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa'i sprin rgya chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / mig tha dad pa med pa'i gtsug phud dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun nas spyod pa dang / phyogs kyi lha phyogs su rnam par lta ba phreng ba'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa phyogs kyi lha mu med pa kun kyang sems can gyi rgyud kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable direction spirits, led by such spirits as Dwelling Everywhere, Ubiquitous Light, Array of Light Beams, Traveling Everywhere Unhindered, Forever Ending Confusion, Roaming Everywhere in Pure Space, Great Sound of Cloud Banners, Topknot and Eyes Undisturbed, Universally Observing the Doings of the Worlds, Traveling Everywhere Watching. They were able, by means of their skills, to emanate light in all directions, always illuminating the ten directions continuously without interruption.

mtshan mo'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar mtshan mo'i lha dpal dri ma med cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od dang / kun nas skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal dang / rab tu dga' ba'i mig gis 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang / sgras zhi ba rgya mtsho dang ldan pa dang / mtshan mo thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal dang / shing thams cad rab tu rgyas par byed pa'i 'od dang / kun nas skyong zhing srung ba'i dpal dang / dge ba thams cad kyi dga' ba la dbang sgyur ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa thams cad zhi bar bya bas dbang po rab tu dga' ba dang / mtshan mo'i lha dge ba'i bsod nams 'byung ba'i dpal ston pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mtshan mo'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang chos kyi dga' ba 'byung ba la mos par gnas pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable night spirits, led by such spirits as Pure Light of Universal Virtue, Observing the World with Joyful Eyes, Everywhere Manifesting Auspicious Omens, Everywhere Causing Tree Flowers to Bloom, All Senses Always Joyful, Producing Pure Bounty. They all practiced diligently, taking delight in the truth.

nyin mo'i lha gzhal du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar nyin mo'i lha khyim dang gzhal med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pa dang / brtsams pa'i blo gros mtshams sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas dga' ba'i dpal gyi rgyan dang / me tog dang spos yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang / kun nas yid du 'ong ba'i sman sten pa sgrub pa'i dpal dang / dga' ba'i mig bzang pos tshim par byed pa dang / tshul rgya chen po'i phyogs kun nas byung ba'i dpal dang / snying rje rgya chen po'i gzi brjid kyi 'od dang / snang ba rgya chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi 'bral ba'i 'od dang / nyin mo'i lha me tog gi phreng ba kun nas 'phyang ba'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa nyin mo'i lha gzhal du med pa kun kyang mos pa'i chos gzhal du med pa'i rgyan la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable day spirits, led by such as Displaying Palaces, Bringing Forth the Fragrance of Wisdom, Delighting in Superb Adornments, Exquisite Light of Fragrant Flowers, Collecting All Wonderful Herbs, Liking to Make Joyful Eyes, Appearing In All Places, Light of Great Compassion, Radiance of Goodness, Garlands of Beautiful Flowers. They all had certain faith in the sublime truth and always strived diligently in concert to adorn the palace.

lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde ba'i mchog dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtshon cha chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rdo rje sra ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs rgya chen po'i rgyu'i blo gros dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dpal gyi be'u rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtul zhugs bzang po'i dbyangs dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun kyang sgyu dang / nga rgyal dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable titan kings, led by such as Rahula, Bhimacitta, Skillful Magical Arts, Great Following, Great Strength, Universal Shining, Wonderful Adornment of Firm Action, Vast Causal Wisdom, Manifesting Superior Qualities, Sublime Voice. They had all worked energetically to conquer pride and other afflictions.

nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mi shigs pa'i sems rin chen gtsug phud dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs dri ma med pa'i dpal dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rgya mtsho chen po'i 'od kyi tshul 'chang ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chos brtan pa dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po cod pan sna tshogs dpal gyi gtsug phud dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhin kun tu khyab par ston pa'i shugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dge ba'i rgya mtsho kun nas lta ba dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po klu'i sgra yangs pa kun tu lta ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs yangs pa rab tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable garuda kings, led by such as Power of Great Swiftness, Unbreakable Jewel Topknot, Pure Speed, Nonregressing Mind, Sustaining Power in the Ocean, Steady Pure Light, Artistically Decorated Crown Topknot, Immediate Manifestation Everywhere, Surveying the Ocean, Universal Sound and Broad Eyes. They had already perfected the power of great skill in expedient methods of liberation and were able to rescue all beings.

mi'am ci'i dbang po du ma dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar mi'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po me tog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po nga ro yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po shing rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po mthong na dga' zhing spro bar byed pa dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan gyi dpal gyi 'od dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog tshon bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po sa'i gzhi'i dpal dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po drag shul gyi bdag po dang / de dag la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po du ma kun kyang chos thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also an inconceivable number of kinnara kings, led by such as Heaven of Light of Refined Intellect, Exquisite Flower Banner, Various Adornments, Pleasing Sound, Jewel Tree Light, Delight to the Beholder, Adornment of Supreme Light, Delicate Flower Banner, Earth-Shaking Power, Conquering Evil Beings. They all made diligent efforts, contemplating all things, their minds always blissful, roaming freely.

lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'phrul po che sa mtshams med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po'i gzi brjid dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po gzi brjid kyi dbyangs la rdul med pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros sna tshogs mchog gi gtsug phud dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po mig bzang po'i bdag po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po sgron ma'i skyabs kyi rgyal po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po snang ba shugs bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po seng+ge'i phru gu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rgyan sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po ri rab kyi bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po sa mtshams med pa kun kyang sems can gyi gti mug gi dra ba chen po bsal ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable mahoraga kings, led by such as Beneficent Wisdom, Pure Dignified Sound, Adornment of Supreme Wisdom, Lord of Sublime Eyes, Lamplike Banner, Refuge of the Masses, Supreme Light Banner, Lion Guts, Sound Adorned by Myriad Subtleties, Stable as a Polar Mountain, Delightful Light. They all diligently cultivated great and extensive skills in method to cause sentient beings to forever tear apart the net of ignorance.

dri za'i bdag po tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri za'i rgyal po shing mi 'am ci'i 'od dang / dri za'i rgyal po mig gtsang ma dga' ba rab tu skye ba dang / dri za'i rgyal po me tog dang / dri za'i rgyal po shing shin tu rgyas pa'i cod pan dang / dri za'i rgyal po dga' bas spyod pa kun tu sgrog pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ba rgyun du gnas pa'i mig bzang po dang / dri za'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'od zer kun tu 'gyed pa'i 'od dang / dri za'i rgyal po rdo rje shing gi yal ga'i rgyal mtshan dang / dri za'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po tshad med pa kun kyang mos pa dang / dga' ba rgya chen po la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable gandharva kings, led by such as Sustaining the Nation, Tree Light, Clear Eyes, Flower Crown, Universal Sound, Joyously Moving Beautiful Eyes, Wondrous Sound Lion Banner, Diamond Tree Flower Banner, Joyfully Causing Adornments to Appear Everywhere. They all had deep faith and appreciation of the great teaching, rejoiced in it and respected it, and diligently practiced it tirelessly.

grul bum gyi bdag po tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bdag po klu bdag dang / grul bum gyi dbang po legs par spyad pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / grul bum gyi dbang po phan par spyod par 'phar ba dang / grul bum gyi dbang po 'jigs pa las sgrol ba dang / grul bum gyi dbang po sA la sna tshogs bzang po dang / grul bum gyi dbang po ri rab legs par byung ba dang / grul bum gyi dbang po sde dpa' ba dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dge ba'i mig gi 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / grul bum gyi dbang po lha dang lha ma yin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i mig dang / de dag la sogs pa grul bum gyi bdag po tshad med pa kun kyang chags pa med pa'i chos snang ba mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kumbanda kings, led by such as Increase, Dragon Lord, Banner of Adornments of Goodness, Universally Beneficial Action, Most Fearsome, Handsome with Beautiful Eyes, High Peak Intellect, Brave and Strong Arms, Boundless Pure Flower Eyes, Enormous Godlike Face with Titan’s Eyes. They all diligently practiced and studied the teachings of freedom from impediment, and emitted great light.

klu'i bdag po mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar klu'i dbang po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i dbang po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i dbang po sprin sgra sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / klu'i dbang po 'od 'phro ba'i sgo rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba dang / klu'i dbang po kun nas ri'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / klu'i dbang po 'jog po dang / klu'i dbang po mtha' yas par 'gro ba dang / klu'i dbang po mdzod spu'i gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i shugs dang / klu'i dbang po kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po'i dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang po ma dros pa dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i dbang po mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can gyi nyon mongs pas gdung ba'i tsha ba chen po char pa'i sprin gyis shin tu zhi bar bya ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable great naga kings, led by such as Virupaksha, Shakra, Subtle Banner of Cloud Sounds, Flaming Mouth Ocean Light, Ubiquitous High Cloud Banner, Unbounded Steps, Pure Form, Great Sound Traveling Everywhere, No Heat or Torment; they all worked hard making clouds and spreading rain to cause the heat and afflictions of all beings to vanish.

gnod sbyin gyi bdag po kun tu mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ngal bso po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dbyangs chen dbang phyug dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sa la shin tu gtum pa'i mtshon cha dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po blo gros chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig 'od 'phro ba'i bdag po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde mchog tu dpa' ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde'i rgyan chen pos rab tu gnon pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dge ba'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ri bo'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa kun kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / yongs su srung bar rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable yaksha kings, led by such as Vaishravana, Independent Sound, Solemn Weapon Bearer, Great Wisdom, Lord of Flaming Eyes, Adamantine Eye, Arm of Courage and Strength, Bravely Resisting General, Rich in Material Goods, Power to Smash High Mountains. They all strived to guard and protect all living beings.

zla ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha du ma dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu zla ba dang / lha'i bu 'od kyi me tog rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / lha'i bu dpal gyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi 'od dang / lha'i bu 'jig rten dga' ba'i bde ba sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu shing gi dbang po'i mig gi 'od dang / lha'i bu 'od bzang po ston pa dang / lha'i bu kun nas spyod pa mi sgul ba'i 'od dang / lha'i bu skar ma'i rgyal po'i bdag po dang / lha'i bu blo dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / lha'i bu gzi brjid chen po'i 'od zer mdzes pa dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu zla ba'i ris su gtogs pa du ma kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems rin po che snang bar bya ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable moon deities, led by such as Moon Godling, Flower King Topknot Halo, Myriad Sublime Pure Lights, Pacifying the Hearts of the World, Luminosity of Tree King Eyes, Manifesting Pure Light, Immutable Light Traveling Everywhere, Sovereign Monarch of Constellations, Moon of Pure Awareness, Great Majestic Light. All strived to bring to light the mind-jewel of living beings.

nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu gzi brjid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba'i mig dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'od dang / rin chen dri med rmad du byung ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa rab tu gnon pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen gtsug phud rnam par snang ba dang / mig kun tu snang ba dang / sa'i dpal gyi be'u 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu sgo thams cad skyob pa'i dpal gyi 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa mu med pa kun kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan par rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable sun deities, led by such as Sun Godling, Eyes of Flames of Light, Awesome Light, Undefiled Jewel Arrays, Nonregressing Courage, Light of Beautiful Flower Garlands, Supreme Banner Light, Universal Light of a Jewel Topknot, Eyes of Light. All of them diligently learned and practiced to benefit living beings and increase their roots of goodness.

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu sgra kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug dkyil 'khor dang / byams par lta ba'i gtsug phud dang / rin po che'i 'od kun tu grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dga' bde 'byung ba'i gtsug phud dang / dran pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ri bo'i sgra'i dpal dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / me tog dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang / ye shes nyi ma'i mig dang / lha'i bu yang dag par skul ba'i 'od kyi dbang phyug dang / de dag la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang chos rgya chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes shing yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the thirty-three heavens, led by such as Shakra-Indra, Everywhere Intoning Fulsome Sound, Kind Eyes Jewel Topknot, Jewel Light Banner Fame, Joy-Producing Topknot, Admirable Right Mindfulness, Supreme Sound of the Polar Mountain, Perfect Mindfulness, Pleasing Flower Light, Eye of the Sun of Knowledge, Independent Light Able to Enlighten. All of them strived to bring forth great works in all worlds.

rab mtshe ma la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma dang / dga' ba bde ba'i 'od dang / blo gros mi zad pa'i yon tan dpal dang / 'phrul ba bzang zhing dge ba dang / sa dang ri bo'i 'od dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang / 'khor lo'i gtsug dang / gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba dang / 'od rnam par snang ba dang / lha'i rgyal po grags pa'i phyogs su rnam par lta ba dang / de dag la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa kun kyang dga' ba dang / spro ba rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the Suyama heavens, led by such as Timely Portion, Delightful Light, Banner of Inexhaustible Wisdom and Virtue, Skilled in Miraculous Displays, Great Light of Memory Power, Inconceivable Wisdom, Circular Navel, Light Flames, Illumination, Greatly Famed for Universal Observation. All of them diligently cultivated great roots of goodness, and their minds were always joyful and content.

lha'i bu rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan dang / dga' ba rgya mtsho'i gtsug phud dang / yon tan mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer zhi ba'i 'od dang / rab tu dga' ba'i mig dang / rin chen 'od zer zla ba dang / rnam par gnon pas rab tu brtson pa dang / rdo rje'i mdog gi 'od bzang po dang / skar mas brgyan pa'i dpal dang / lha'i bu dga' ba bzang po sna tshogs dang / de dag la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu byung ba thams cad rjes su dran par yid la bya ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also an inconceivable number of kings of the Tushita heavens, led by such as Contented, Ocean of Bliss Topknot, Supreme Virtue Banner, Still and Silent Light, Pleasing Beautiful Eyes, Clear Moon on a Jewel Peak, Supreme Courage and Strength, Subtle Diamond Light, Constellation Array Banner, Pleasing Adornments. All of them diligently kept in mind the names and epithets of all the Buddhas.

'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' dang / sgras zhi ba'i 'od dang / stobs kyi 'phrul ba'i sgra'i 'od dang / dbang chen sna tshogs dang / sprin sgra shin tu 'phags pa dang / snang ba spyod pa'i dpal dang / gtsug phud yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i blo gros dang / me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud dang / lha'i rgyal po phyogs shin tu snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa kun kyang rnam par thar pa rab tu zhi bas sems can thams cad gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the heavens of enjoyment of emanations, led by such as Skillful Transformation and Emanation, Light of Silent Sound, Light of the Power of Transformation and Emanation, Master of Adornment, Light of Mindfulness, Supreme Cloud Sound, Supreme Light of Myriad Subtleties, Exquisite Topknot Light, Perfect Joy and Intellect, Flower Light Topknot, and Seeing in All Directions. All of them worked diligently to tame living beings and enable them to attain liberation.

lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa bgrang du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur dang / lha'i rgyal po mig bzang po'i blo gros dang / cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / brtson pa'i blo gros dang / go 'phang rnam par gnon pa'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang / 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / spyod yul zhi ba'i sgo dang / 'khor lo ri mo bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog blo gros seng+ge'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang po'i stobs ri mo bzang po'i 'od dang / de dag la sogs pa dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po bgrang du med pa kun kyang chos kyi dbang rgya chen po la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also countless kings of the heavens of free enjoyment of others’ emanations, led by such as Sovereign Freedom, Sublime Eye Lord, Beautiful Crown Banner, Courageous Intelligence, Wonderful Sound Phrases, Subtle Light Banner, Gate of the Realm of Peace, Array of Splendid Discs Banner, Flower Grove Independent Intellect, and Light of Beautiful Adornments of the Power of Indra. All of them diligently practiced and studied the vast and great teaching of independent skill in means of liberation.

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshangs pa chen po dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar tshangs pa chen po rab tu snang ba dang / blo gros kyi 'od dang / blo gros bzang po'i sems snang ba dang / kun tu dbyangs kyi sprin dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i sgra dang / mig rab tu zhi zhing 'od shin tu zab pa dang / phyogs su snang ba 'gyed pa dang / sprul pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / mig gi 'od zer mngon par snang ba dang / tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba dang / de dag la sogs pa tshangs pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems snang bar bya ba dang / sim par bya bar byams pa chen po la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also uncountable kings of the great brahma heavens, led by such as Shikhin, Light of Wisdom, Radiance of Benificent Wisdom, Sound of Ubiquitous Clouds, Independent Observer of the Sounds of Speech of the Worlds, Eyes of Still Light, All-Pervading Light, Sound of Magical Displays, Eyes of Shining Light, and Pleasing Ocean Sound. All of them had great compassion and took pity on living beings; unfolding light that illumined everywhere, they caused them to be joyful and blissful.

lha'i bu gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu snang bas dga' ba dang / dge ba sna tshogs kyi 'od dang / dbang po'i dbyangs dang / dran pa'i blo dam pa dang / dga' ba sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang / legs par bsam pa'i dbyangs dang / 'od 'gyed pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba dang / dbyangs zab mo'i 'od dang / grags pa dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pas shin tu 'phags pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the heavens in which light is used for sound, led by Pleasing Light, Pure Subtle Light, Sound of Freedom, Supreme Awareness and Knowledge, Delightful Pure Subtle Sound, Sound of Skillful Meditation, Universal Sound Illumining Everywhere, Most Profound Light-Sound, Pure Name Light, and Supreme Pure Light. All of them dwelt in the unhindered state of great peace, tranquility, joy, and bliss.

dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu dge bar grags pa'i blo gros dang mchog tu snang ba dang / rab tu zhi ba'i dpal dang / dbyangs kyi ri bo dang / dran pa dge ba'i mig dang / dga' ba dam pa rnam par snang ba dang / 'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba'i bdag po dang / chos kyi dga' bas 'phrul ba'i sems dang / 'phrul bas shin tu 'phags pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang sgo yangs pa la gnas pas 'gro bar 'gyur zhing rnam par 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the heavens of universal purity, led by such as Pure Reputation, Supreme Vision, Virtue of Tranquility, Sound of the Polar Mountain, Eye of Pure Mindfulness, Light Flame Sovereign, Enjoyer of Meditation on the Truth and Creating Demonstrations, Banner of Miraculous Displays, and Exquisite Array of Constellation Sounds. They were all already abiding securely in the great teaching, and worked diligently to benefit all worlds.

lha'i bu 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba dang / dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang / shes rab mchog gi 'od dang / ye shes dbang po'i dpal dang / dga' ba zhi ba dang / sgo kun nas shes pa'i mig dang / dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros bzang po'i 'od dang / 'od zhi zhing dri ma med pa dang / lha'i bu snang ba chen po dri ma med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba'i chos kyi gzhal med khang la kun nas rab tu gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

There were also innumerable kings of the heavens of vast results, led by such as Banner of the Delightful Light of Truth, Ocean of Pure Adornments, Light of Supreme Wisdom, Independent Wisdom Banner, Delight in Tranquility, Eye of Universal Knowledge, Delight in Use of Intellect, Light of Intellect Sown with Virtue, Undefiled Tranquil Light, and Vast Pure Light. They all dwelt at peace in the palace of tranquility.

lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba dang / lha'i bu dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa dang / lha'i bu shes rab chen pos dga' zhing spro ba dang / lha'i bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang / lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems pa dang / lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba dang / lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang spyod yul mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/

There were also countless kings of the heavens of great freedom, led by such as Sea of Subtle Flames, Light of the Name of Freedom, Eye of Pure Virtues, Enjoyable Great Intelligence, Freedom of Immutable Light, Eyes of Sublime Adornments, Light of Skillful Meditation, Delightful Great Knowledge, Universal Sound Array Banner, and Light of Fame of Extreme Exertion. All of them diligently contemplated the truth of formlessness, and their actions were all equanimous and impartial.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de ni/ sems can gyi ris thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ / sems can yon tan mtha' yas pa 'dus pa las yongs su byung ba'o/ / phyogs kyi dbyings kun na shin tu gnas pa'o/ / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi dbyings su rnam par gnas pa'o/ / phan tshun 'dres pa med cing ji ltar 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/ / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'o/ / sangs rgyas lta ba la sgrib pa med pas snang bar gyur pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon bskal pa rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du bzhud pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung zhing thabs kyi sgo de dag gis yongs su smin par byas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la rab tu bkod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa rab tu bskyed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i stobs dang / shugs rab tu thob pa dag go /smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs shing spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dang gzhan yongs su dag pas yang dag par byung ba 'byung ba'i lam gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong bas snang bar gyur pa dag ste/ de dag ni/ mos pa'i stobs gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug go /sangs rgyas lta ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par 'phrul lo/ /

At that time the oceanic hosts at the Buddha’s site of enlightenment had assembled: the unlimited types and species were all around the Buddha, filling everywhere. Their forms and companies were each different. From wherever they came, they approached the World Honored One, wholeheartedly looking up to him. These assembled masses had already gotten rid of all afflictions and mental defilements as well as their residual habits. They had pulverized the mountains of multiple barriers, and perceived the Buddha without obstruction. They were like this because Vairocana Buddha in past times, over oceans of eons, cultivating the practices of enlightening beings, had received them and taken care of them with the four saving practices of generosity, kind words, beneficial action, and cooperation, and while planting roots of goodness in the company of each Buddha in those eons, had already taken good care of them and had taught and developed them by various means, establishing them on the path of omniscience, where they sowed innumerable virtues, gained great merits, and had all entered completely into the ocean of skill in liberative means and undertaking of vows. The actions they carried out were fully pure, and they had well embarked on the way to emancipation. They always saw the Buddha, clearly illumined, and by the power of supreme understanding entered into the ocean of the qualities of buddhahood. They found the doors of liberation of all Buddhas, and roamed freely in spiritual powers.

de ni/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar zhi ba'i tshul gyi mthu zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad la dbang ba'i stobs la yang dag par gzhol zhing kun nas rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / brjod du med cing sbyar ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu shes rab chen po dga' zhing spro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi tshul thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa'i shes rab rgya mtshos rnam par dpyod pa la rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde ba mtha' yas pa la mos pa bstan pa rgya chen po'i tshul yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mi shes pa'i mun nag dang / 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa'i spyod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam pa'i yul mtha' yas pa'i las srid pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs su 'gro zhing yongs su non pa dang / rten pa'i phyogs kyi mthu zhes bya'o; ;lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu zhi ba la 'jug pa kun nas khong du chud pa'i gtsug rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rang gi gzhal med khang dang /blo'i yul nas dmigs pa tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rang gi gzhal med khang dang /blo'i yul nas dmigs pa tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /

That is to say, Ocean of Subtle Flames, a king of a heaven of great freedom, found the door of liberation through the tranquility and practical power of the realm of space and the cosmos. The celestial king Light of the Name of Freedom gained the door of liberation through freely observing all things. The celestial king Eye of Pure Virtues found the door of liberation of effortless action knowing that all things are not born, do not perish, and do not come or go. The celestial king Enjoyable Great Intelligence found the door of liberation through the ocean of wisdom directly perceiving the real character of all things. The celestial king Freedom of Immutable Light found the door of liberation through the great practical concentration of bestowing boundless peace and happiness on living beings. The celestial king Eye of Sublime Adornments found the door of liberation through causing observation of the truth of nullity and annihilating all ignorance and fear. The celestial king Light of Skillful Meditation found the door of liberation through entering infinite realms without producing any activity of thought about existents. The celestial king Delightful Great Knowledge found the door of liberation by going everywhere in the ten directions to preach the truth, yet without moving and without relying on anything. The celestial king Universal Sound Array Banner found the gate of liberation by entry into the Buddhas’ realm of tranquility and everywhere manifesting great light. The celestial king Light of Fame of Extreme Exertion found the gate of liberation by abiding in his own enlightenment, yet having an infinitely broad perspective.

de nas dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtshos sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the celestial king Ocean of Subtle Flames, imbued with the spiritual power of the Buddha, surveyed the whole host of celestial beings of the heavens of great freedom, and said in verse,

mi zad chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' yas te/ / kun kyang sangs rgyas sku la rab tu gsal; ; de ni gzung med dngos med rab tu zhi/ / 'gro ba'i skyabs su rang byung skyes shing byung / /
chos kyi sgron ma sangs rgyas shin tu ston/ / chos la mnga' rab mdzad pa 'jig rten byung / / de yi spyod yul mtha' yas mi zad de/ / dbang phyug grags pa 'di 'dra'i mos la 'jug /
bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas snang ba byed/ / de yi mtshan nyid phyogs na med pa ste; ; rnam dag lam ni skye bo dag la ston/ / shin tu dri med mig gis 'di 'dra mthong / /
'gro ba kun gyis bsam du mi nus te/ / rgyal ba'i shes rab mtha' yas gang mnga' ba/ / gti mug sgrib pa'i sems can rnam par sbyong / / de la shes rab chen po rnam par gnas/ /
skye rgu kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ / mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur; ; 'gro ba'i dga' ba rgya chen rab tu bskyed/ / mi sgul dbang phyug lha yis de mthong ngo/ /
sems can rgya mtsho gti mug mun bsgribs la/ / sangs rgyas chos nyid rab tu zhi ba ston; ; shes rab sgron ma 'gro ba 'di brjod de/ / dge ba'i mig ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam dag sku ston cing / / thams cad phyogs su shin tu 'phags pa'i sku; ; de yang dngos med 'jig rten mi gnas te/ / kun tu snang ba sems pa 'di ltar lta/ /
mtha' yas chags med rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung / / snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag nyan/ sangs rgyas rnams las 'pho bar mi snang ste/ / 'di ni shes pas dga' ba'i rnam thar to/ /
thams cad phyogs sgo kun nas sangs rgyas te/ / mi yi dbang po rnam thar zhi la bzhugs/ / sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang zhing rnam par mdzes/ / 'di ni sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam thar to/ /
rgyal ba bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas su/ / 'gro ba kun don rnam par byang chub cing / / sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul bas sems can 'dul/ / rnam par snang bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo/ /

The buddha body extends throughout all the great assemblies: It fills the cosmos, without end. Quiescent, without essence, it cannot be grasped; It appears just to save all beings.
The Buddha, King of the Teaching, appears in the world Able to light the lamp of sublime truth which illumines the world; His state is boundless and inexhaustible: This is what Name of Freedom has realized.
The Buddha is inconceivable, beyond discrimination, Comprehending forms everywhere as insubstantial. For the sake of the world he opens wide the path of purity: This is what Pure Eyes can see.
The Buddha’s wisdom is unbounded— No one in the world can measure it. It forever destroys beings’ ignorance and confusion: Great Intelligence has entered this deeply and abides there in peace.
The Buddha’s virtues are inconceivable; In beings who witness them afflictions die out. They cause all worlds to find peace: Immutable Freedom can see this.
Sentient beings, in the darkness of ignorance, are always deluded; The Buddha expounds for them the teaching of dispassion and serenity. This is the lamp of wisdom that illumines the world: Sublime Eyes knows this technique.
The Buddha’s body of pure subtle form Is manifest everywhere and has no compare; This body has no essence and no resting place: It is contemplated by Skillful Meditation.
The voice of the Buddha has no limit or obstruction; All those capable of accepting the teaching hear it. Yet the Buddha is quiescent and forever unmoving: This is the liberation of Delightful Knowledge.
Serene, emancipated, master of the celestial and the human, There is nowhere in the ten directions he does not appear. The radiance of his light fills the world: This is seen by Majestic Banner of Unimpeded Truth.
The Buddha sought enlightenment for the sake of all beings Over boundless oceans of eons; With various spiritual powers he teaches all: Light of Fame has realized this truth.

de la lha'i rgyal po chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / the tshom rnam par lta ba'i sems kyi sprin la rab tu gzhol ba zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rnam pa thams cad yid la byed pa ston pa sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po shes rab mchog gi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i lus kyi rgyan ces bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po ye shes dbang po'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i sems skad cig tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po dga' ba zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod rgu 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po sgo kun nas shes pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rnam par lta bas 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / byed pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po yon tan blo gros bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dmigs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dgos pa thams cad chos gzhal du med cing / bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bu 'od zhi zhing dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can dang / chos dang / 'byung ba thams cad kyi sgo la mngon sum du yang dag par spyod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / lha'i rgyal po snang ba chen po dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing / sangs rgyas skye ba'i chos nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the celestial king Banner of the Delightful Light of Truth found the door of liberation in observing the faculties of all beings, expounding the truth for them, and cutting off their doubts. The celestial king Ocean of Pure Adornments found the door of liberation causing vision of Buddha whenever brought to mind. The celestial king Light of Supreme Wisdom found the door of liberation realizing the body of adornments that have no basis and are equal in terms of phenomenal nature. The celestial king Banner of Independent Wisdom found the door of liberation of comprehending all mundane things and in a single instant setting up oceans of inconceivable adornments. The celestial king Delight in Tranquility found the door of liberation of manifesting inconceivable buddha-lands in a single pore without hindrance. The celestial king Eye of Universal Knowledge found the door of liberation of all-sided observation of the universe. The celestial king Delight in Use of Intellect found the door of liberation producing all kinds of displays for the benefit of all beings, always appearing eternally.
