The space spirit Deep and Far-Reaching Sublime Sound found the door of liberation of the light of knowledge seeing everywhere. The space spirit All-Pervading Light found the door of liberation manifesting everywhere without moving from its own place.

de nas nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus nam mkha'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the space spirit Pure Light Shining All Around, imbued with the power of the Buddha, surveyed all the space spirits and spoke the following verses,

rgyal ba'i spyan ni rgya chen yangs pa yis/ / sems can rgya mtsho ma lus kun gzigs te/ / 'gro ba kun la mngon par rab tu bzhugs/ / sangs rgyas dri med nam mkha' rab tu 'dra/ /
sangs rgyas sku yi rgya chen 'od kyi rnams/ / phyogs bcu'i 'gro kun khyab cing rnam par mdzes/ / thams cad phyogs su mngon par rab tu gnas/ / kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo/ /
rgyal ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba med/ / 'di la gzung ba snang ba gang yang med; ; thogs pa med cing rang bzhin med pa ste/ / rlung gi 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo/ /
bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya phrag mang por yang / / sangs rgyas sems can sgrib pa sel bar mdzad/ / lam yangs rnam par thar pa rab tu ston/ / 'di ni dpa' bo dkyil 'khor 'od kyi 'o/ /
sngon chad sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa'i rnams/ / 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde don du/ / ji ltar byung ba de dag bdag gis mthong / / 'di ni sna tshogs gtsug phud spyod yul lo/ /
'khor ba rgya mtsho kun tu rgyu ba yi/ / sems can log par lhung zhing 'khor ba la/ / sangs rgyas 'od ni sdug bsngal zhi ba'i rgyu/ / snang ba'i 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo/ /
bsod nams dge ba thams cad snying po ste/ / chags med stobs dang ye shes rgya chen mkhyen/ / 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams zhing gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas de ltar chags med stobs sems so/ /
mun pa stug po'i spyod yul rnam rgyu ba'i/ / sems can sgrib pas rab tu blong ba la/ / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rab 'gyed de/ / dri med phyogs snang lhas ni de mthong ngo/ /
sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu 'phags pa yi/ / mtha' dang dbus yang dmigs par mi rung ste/ / zhing kun 'gro la mngon par 'od kyang snang / / zab mo'i 'od kyis de ltar sangs rgyas mthong / /
phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun na spyod pa yi/ / sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas smon lam rgya chen shin tu yangs/ / mngon par lta bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo/ /

The vast eye of the Buddha Is pure and clear as space, Seeing all beings With complete clarity.
The great light of the Buddha body Illumines the ten directions, Manifesting in every place: Traveling Everywhere sees this way.
The Buddha body is like space; Unborn, it clings to nothing, It is ungraspable and without inherent nature: This is seen by Wind of Good Omen.
The Buddha, for countless eons, Has expounded all holy paths, Destroying barriers for all beings: Sphere of Perfect Light understands this.
I observe the enlightenment practices Accumulated by the Buddha in the past, All to make the world at peace: Beautiful Topknot works in this sphere.
The realms of all sentient beings Whirl in the sea of birth and death. Buddha emits a pain-killing light: The Unhindered spirit can see this.
His treasury of pure virtues Is a field of blessings for the world, Appropriately enlightening with knowledge: The spirit Power understands this.
Sentient beings are veiled by ignorance, Wandering on dangerous paths; The Buddha emanates light for them: Spotless Light realizes this.
Knowledge and wisdom have no bounds, Appearing in every land, With light illumining the world: Sublime Sound sees Buddha here.
Buddha, to liberate beings, Cultivates practices everywhere; This grandiose will Universal Manifestation can observe.

de la rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha kun tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i mthu'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mchod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri 'joms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha chu drag po'i snying po skem pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bdud kyi 'khor lo sgo kun nas 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog cing zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha shing gi rtse mo'i me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi tshul tha dad pa med par yang dag par shes pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha thogs pa med par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par dgod pa'i tshul gyis 'dul ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i shugs kyis gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rlung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi mun pa kun nas snang bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su bsnyegs pas thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the wind spirit Unimpended Light found the door of liberation entering into all the Buddha teachings and all worlds. The wind spirit Everywhere Manifesting Courageous Action found the door of liberation providing extensive offerings to all the Buddhas appearing in innumerable lands. The wind spirit Wind Striking Cloud Banner found the door of liberation eliminating the sickness of all sentient beings with a fragrant wind. The wind spirit Arrays of Pure Light found the door of liberation producing roots of goodness in all sentient beings and causing them to pulverize the mountains of multiple barriers. The wind spirit Power to Dry Up Water found the door of liberation able to defeat boundless armies of malicious demons. The wind spirit Great Voice Howling Everywhere found the door of liberation annihilating the fears of all sentient beings. The wind spirit Tree Branch Hanging Topknot found the door of liberation of the ocean of powers of elucidation, entering into the real character of all things. The wind spirit Going Everywhere Unimpeded found the door of liberation of the treasury of techniques to harmonize and civilize all sentient beings. The wind spirit Various Mansions found the door of liberation entering into still, serene meditative poise and destroying the extremely deep darkness of folly and ignorance. The wind spirit Great Light Shining Everywhere found the door of liberation of unhindered power to go along with all sentient beings.
de nas rlung gi lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus rlung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the wind spirit Unimpeded Light, imbued with the power of the Buddha, looked over all the wind spirits and said in verse,

rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid zab mo 'dzin pa ste/ / chags med thams cad tshul gyis de la 'jug / 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs/ / de ni mtshan med gzugs brnyan yod pa min; ;
sangs rgyas thams cad mthu la rnam par ltos/ / byang chub spyad pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe/ / skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mchod cing bstod/ / de la rgyas byed 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab 'gro ba'i mgon/ / tshul rnams kun gyis sbyor ba chud za med/ / sdug bsngal kun las sems can ma lus skyob/ / rgyal mtshan reg pas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo/ /
'gebs dang sgrib pa shin tu stug po yi/ / mi bdes bsgribs shing bsod nams med pa yi/ / sems can sdug bsngal kun las ma lus bkrol/ / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhas ni 'di mthong ngo/ /
rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ / rnam pa kun gyis bdud rnams shin tu 'joms/ / tshul gyis 'dul ba de la rab tu sgrog / gzi brjid drag po'i mthus ni 'di mthong ngo/ /
rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo rnams thams cad nas/ / 'gro ba kun 'gengs sgra yi dbyangs 'byung ba/ / de dag sdug bsngal 'jigs pa thams cad med/ / 'di ni sgra sgrog lha yis rab tu shes/ /
'gro ba kun mnyam rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams su/ / so so yang dag rig pas bder gshegs so/ / mtha' yas bskal par rang byung yang dag ston/ / shing gi gtsug phud 'phyang ba de la 'jug /
rgyal ba'i ye shes thabs rnams kun sgo nas/ / kun tu chags shing thogs pa med pa ste/ / spyod yul gzhal yas kun tu mtha' yang med/ / 'di ni chags med 'gro ba'i rnam thar to/ /
rgyal ba'i spyod yul mtha' yas dag la ltos/ / rab zhi sku mnga' mtshan med sangs rgyas te/ / thabs sgo kun nas 'on kyang rab tu snang / / phung po sna tshogs bdag po'i rnam thar to/ /
mi mgon bskal pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe/ / de 'dra'i chos kyis 'gro kun tshim mdzad pas/ / thams cad stobs la sangs rgyas rab tu bzhugs/ / 'jig rten stobs 'dzin lha yis 'di mthong ngo/ /

The teachings of all Buddhas are most profound, With unhindered means by which all may enter, Appearing always in all worlds, Signless, formless, without image.
Observe how the Buddha in the past Gave offerings to endless Buddhas in a single instant— Such bold enlightenment practice Everywhere Manifesting can comprehend.
Buddha saves the world inconceivably; None of his methods are used in vain— All cause action to be free from distress: This is the liberation of Cloud Banner.
Beings have no blessings, they suffer many pains, With heavy veils and dense barriers always deluding them. Buddha makes them all attain liberation: This is known to Pure Light.
The Buddha’s vast mystic power Conquers all armies of demons; All his methods of subduing Healthy Power is able to observe.
Buddha emanates subtle sound from his pores Which extends everywhere throughout the world Causing all misery and fear to end: This is understood by Howling Everywhere.
Buddha, in all oceans of lands, Always preaches, over unthinkable eons. This wonderful elucidation power of buddhahood Tree Branch Topknot can comprehend.
Buddha’s knowledge enters all avenues of means, Completely free of hindrance therein— His realm is boundless and without any equal: This is the liberation of Going Everywhere.
The Buddha’s state is without bounds— By expedient means he shows it everywhere, Yet his body is tranquil and has no form: This is the liberation door of Various Mansions.
The Buddha cultivated practices for oceans of eons And has completely fulfilled all powers And can respond to beings in accord with worldly norms: This is the view of Shining Everywhere.

de la me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs thams cad dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs dang / rab tu gdung ba rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha 'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsod nams kyi stobs mi sgul ba dang / snying rje ba dang byams pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha rgyal mtshan gya rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis g.yog pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pa snang bas gsal bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ / me'i lha dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba dang bsod nams sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i 'od rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab kyi spo'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad me ltar 'bar ba'i sems can gyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha 'od drag shul can gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rtsom pas rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chags par lta ba'i gti mug thams cad rnam par spong ba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya'o/ / me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'i stobs 'byung ba yang dag par sgrub pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the fire spirit Repository of Flames of Universal Light found the door of liberation removing the darkness of all worlds. The fire spirit Banner of Universal Assembly of Light found the door of liberation able to end all sentient beings’ delusions, wanderings, and pains of irritating afflictions. The fire spirit Great Light Shining Everywhere found the door of liberation of the treasury of great compassion with the immutable power of enriching. The fire spirit Topknot of Inexhaustible Light found the door of liberation of light beams illuminating the boundless reaches of space. The fire spirit Eyes of Various Flames found the door of liberation of silent, serene lights in various magnificent arrays. The fire spirit Palace of Wonders found the door of liberation observing the Buddha’s spiritual powers appearing without bound. The fire spirit Palaces in All Directions Like Polar Mountains found the door of liberation able to extinguish the blazing torments of all beings in all worlds. The fire spirit Sovereign of Awesome Light found the door of liberation able to freely enlighten all beings. The fire spirit Light Shining in All Directions found the door of liberation destroying forever all ignorant, attached opinions. The fire spirit Thunder and Lightning found the door of liberation of the great roar of power to fulfill all undertakings.
de nas me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus me'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time, the fire spirit Repository of Flames of Universal Light, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the fire spirits and said in verse,

rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus stobs la rnam par ltos/ / bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas par/ / 'gro ba'i don du phan pa rab brtsams te/ / sems can kun gyi mun pa rnam par bsal/ /
nyon mongs dba' rlabs ldan pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ / lta la gnas shing gti mug bsgribs pa yi/ / nyon mongs me ni mgon pos zhi bar mdzad/ / de la rgyal mtshan dkyil 'khor rab tu dga'/ /
rgyal ba'i spyod yul rgya chen bdag gis mthong / / phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang / / rgyal ba'i byin gyis brlabs rnams rab tu 'jug / mthong nas snang ba'i 'od ni rab tu dga'/ /
rgyal ba'i bsod nam mi zad nam mkha' bzhin/ / de yi mtha' ni kun tu mi rnyed de/ / rgyal ba'i thugs rje bskyed du yong mi nus/ / 'di la dpal gyi sprin sgra rab tu 'jug /
bskal pa bye bar spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ / chos tshul gang rnams bstan pa de dag gi / mtha' ni nam yang rnyed par sla ba min/ / rnam thar 'di ni gzi brjid gtsug phud kyi'o/ /
phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams shin tu yangs pa dag / sangs rgyas mgon po thams cad mngon du lta/ / 'gro ba kun la thub pa rnam par mdzes/ / 'di la dka' thub 'od 'phro dpal 'jug go /
'gro ba kun na thub pa rab tu 'phags/ / khang khyim thams cad dag na bzhugs par snang / / rnam par yangs pa'i chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ / 'di ni phyogs snang byed pa'i spyod yul lo/ /
rgyal ba nyid kyi chos rnams zab pa ste/ / thams cad chos kyi 'gro bar rang byung zhing / / ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid ston pa mdzad/ / de la drag shul 'od ni rab tu dga'/ /
lta ba'i mun nag gti mug bsgribs pa yi/ / 'jig rten bag med 'khrugs pa thams cad la/ / rgyal bas chos ni rab tu bstan mdzad de/ / de la rnam par snang ba'i lha dga'o; ;
rgyal ba'i smon lam sngon chad byung ba'i rnams/ / ci 'dra bsam gyis khyab par mi rung ste/ / stobs dang pha rol phyin pas rnam par sbyangs/ / 'od 'phro'i sprin ni 'di la 'di ltar 'jug /

Observe the Buddhas’ power of energy— For vast, inconceivable millions of eons They have appeared in the world to help sentient beings, Causing all barriers of darkness to be destroyed.
Sentient beings, in their folly, create various views; Their passions are like torrents, like fires blazing; The Guide’s techniques remove them all: Banner of Universal Assembly of Light understands this.
Blessings and virtues like space, unending— No bounds to them can ever be found; This is the Buddha’s immutable power of compassion: Light Shining, realizing this, conceives great joy.
I observe the Buddha’s practices Over the eons, without bound, Thus manifesting spiritual powers: Palace of Wonders understands this.
Practice perfected over billions of eons, inconceivable, To which no one can find any bound or limit, Buddha expounds the real character of things, causing joy: This is perceived by Inexhaustible Light.
All the vast masses in the ten directions Behold the Buddha present before them, The tranquil light clearly lighting the world: This Subtle Flames can comprehend.
The Sage appears in all worlds, Sitting in all their palaces, Raining the boundless great teaching: This is the perspective of All Directions.
The Buddhas’ wisdom is most profound; Free in all ways, they appear in the world, Able to clarify all genuine truths: Awesome Light, realizing this, rejoices at heart.
The folly of views is a dark veil; Beings, deluded, eternally wander; For them Buddha opens the gate of sublime teaching: Illumining All Quarters can understand this.
The gate of Buddhas’ vows is vast, inconceivable— Their powers and transcendent ways are developed and purified; All appear in the world according to their ancient vows: This is what Thunder and Lightning understands.

de la chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha sprin sgra'i shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi sprin mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / chu'i lha chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing sdud pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha bzang por 'khyil ba grub pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo'i 'od kyi char pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha kun nas spos dri ma med pa'i myu gu'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od dri ma med pa rnam par lta ba la yang dag par 'jug pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha dpa' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams stegs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid med cing dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su sgrub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ snying rje rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ ;chu'i lha sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / chu'i lha 'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsod nams chags pa med pa shin tu rgyas pas kun tu snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o/ / chu'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi nga ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i sbyor ba nam mkha' lta bus 'dul bar spyod pa zhes bya'o; ;

Furthermore, the water spirit Ubiquitous Cloud Banner realized the door of liberation of compassion equally benefiting all beings. The water spirit Cloudlike Sound of the Ocean Tide found the door of liberation adorned with boundless truths. The water spirit Beautiful Round Topknot found the door of liberation observing those who could be taught and dealing with them with appropriate techniques. The water spirit Whirlpool of Skills found the door of liberation everywhere expounding the most profound realm of the Buddhas. The water spirit Store of Undefiled Fragrance found the door of liberation everywhere manifesting pure, bright light. The water spirit Virtue Bridge Light Sound found the signless, essenceless door of liberation of the pure realm of truth. The water spirit Freedom of Contentment found the door of liberation of the inexhaustible ocean of great compassion. The water spirit Good Sound of Pure Joy found the door of liberation being a mine of great joy among the hosts of enlightening beings at sites of enlightenment. The water spirit Everywhere Manifesting Awesome Light found the door of liberation appearing everywhere by means of the unimpeded, immensely vast power of virtue. The water spirit Roaring Sound Filling the Sea found the door of liberation observing all sentient beings and producing infinite techniques for harmonizing and pacifying them.

de nas chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the water spirit Ubiquitous Cloud Banner, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the water spirits and said,

rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams re re thams cad kyang / / sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ / byams pa mngon du gyur pas byung ba bzang / / sems can kun gyis blta zhing mi ngoms so/ /
'gro ba kun tu rgyal ba rnams drung du/ / skyo ba med par spyad cing rnam sbyangs te/ / rnam pa sna tshogs chos kyi sgo yang ston/ / rgya mtsho'i shugs ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
rgyal ba rnams ni 'pho bar mi snang ste/ / phyogs rnams bcu nas byon par snang ba med/ / snod kyi tshul bzhin sems can rnams kyang lta/ / chu yi gtsug phud dkyil 'khor de la lta/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni gzhal du med/ / sems can kun gyis bsam par mi nus te/ / phyogs rnams kun tu khyab par sgra sgrog go / 'di ni snyan pa'i gtsug phud yul yin no/ /
sangs rgyas 'od ni mi zad gnas pa ste/ / bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings kyis klas/ / sems can thams cad 'dul ba rab tu ston/ / spos kyi phung po sna tshogs lha yis mthong / /
de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mnyam pa ste/ / phyogs rnams kun tu dri med mtshan nyid med/ / phyogs rnams kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang / / dba' rlabs sgra yi bsod nams 'od kyis mthong / /
snying rje'i sgo ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ / sems can kun dang mnyam par sngon bshad do/ / sprin dang 'dra bar 'gro ba mngon sum mo; ; de ltar de ni dga' ba 'byung bas mthong / /
phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams gang yod pa/ / de dag kun na sangs rgyas gdan bzhugs snang / / shin tu rgyas pa'i byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ / dga' ba rdul med dbyangs kyis de mthong ngo/ /
sangs rgyas spyod yul chags pa med pa ste/ / shin tu rgya che phyogs rnams kun tu gnas/ / rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal ba ston mdzad de/ / de la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams la mtha' med de/ / 'gro ba kun dbyangs [*dbyings?] thub pa med par 'jug / rgyal ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra ste/ / nga ros 'gengs pa rnam thar 'di la 'jug /

Gates of pure compassion, as many as atoms in all lands, Together produce a single sublime feature of the Buddha. Other features also are each like this: Therefore beholders of Buddha never become jaded.
When the Buddha cultivated practice in the past, He went to visit all of the Buddhas, Cultivating himself in various ways, never lax: These methods Cloud Sound enters.
The Buddha, in all ten directions, Is still, unmoving, not coming or going, Yet teaches beings appropriately, causing them all to see: This is what Round Topknot knows.
The realm of the Buddha is boundless, immeasurable— All sentient beings cannot comprehend it. The preaching of his wondrous voice fills all directions: This is Technique Whirlpool’s sphere.
The light of the Buddha has no end; It fills the cosmos, inconceivably, Teaching, edifying, liberating beings: This Pure Fragrance watches and sees.
The Buddha is pure as space, Signless, formless, present everywhere, Yet causing all beings to see: This Light of Blessings well observes.
Of old Buddha practiced great compassion, His mind is broad as all of life. Therefore he is like a cloud appearing in the world: This liberation Contentment knows.
All lands in the ten directions See the Buddha sitting on his seat Becoming clearly enlightened with great realization: This is where Joyful Sound enters in.
Buddha’s sphere of action is free from hindrance— He goes to all lands in the ten directions, Everywhere showing great mystic powers: Manifesting Awesome Light has realized this.
He cultivates boundless expedient practices, Equal to the worlds of sentient beings, filling them all, The subtle action of his mystic power never ceasing: Roaring Sound Filling the Sea can enter this.
bam po bzhi pa/

de la rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho rin po che 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha rdo rje kun nas sra zhing mi choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad srung ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha rdul dang dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho mang po rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha kun nas chu dang / ri bo dang / khyim gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha skyabs rin po che mig gi zla ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shugs chen pos gti mug rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i dpal pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rgyud thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed cing / bde ba 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha chu lta bur ro mthun pa 'dzin pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang / rmongs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rin po che'i rigs thams cad 'byung zhing byang chub kyi sems rab tu skye ba zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems rgya mtsho mi sgul ba'i bsod nams la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the ocean spirit Producing Jewel Light found the door of liberation impartially bestowing an ocean of blessings on all beings. The ocean spirit Unbreakable Diamond Banner found the door of liberation preserving the good roots of all sentient beings by skillful means. The ocean spirit Undefiled found the door of liberation able to evaporate the ocean of all sentient beings’ afflictions. The ocean spirit Always Dwelling in the Waves found the door of liberation causing all sentient beings to depart from evil ways. The ocean spirit Auspicious Jewel Moon found the door of liberation everywhere destroying the darkness of great ignorance. The ocean spirit Beautiful Flower Dragon Topknot found the door of liberation extinguishing the sufferings of all states of being and bestowing peace and happiness. The ocean spirit Everywhere Holding the Flavor of Light found the door of liberation purifying all sentient beings of their opinionated, ignorant nature. The ocean spirit Jewel Flame Flower Light found the door of liberation producing the will of enlightenment which is the source of all nobility. The ocean spirit Beautiful Diamond Topknot found the door of liberation of the ocean of virtues of the unshakable mind. The ocean spirit Thunder of the Ocean Tide found the door of liberation entering everywhere into absorption in the cosmos of reality.

de nas rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgya mtsho'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time, the ocean spirit Producing Jewel Light, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the ocean spirits and spoke these verses,

bskal pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen mang mchod cing / / 'gro ba dag la bsod nams mtshos spel bas/ / de phyir rgyal ba lham me lhang nge'o/ /
'gro ba kun tu rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ / sems can kun gyi dbang po bsam rgyud du/ / chos kyi rgya mtsho rgya chen ston pa mdzad/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sra ba'i dpal dga' 'o/ /

Over an ocean of inconceivably vast eons He made offerings to all the Buddhas, Distributing the merit to all living beings— That is why his dignity is beyond compare.
Appearing in all worlds, Knowing the capacities and desires of all beings, Buddha expounds for them the ocean of truths: This is joyfully realized by Indestructible Banner.
'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten mgon po ni/ / chos kyi sprin las char chen yangs pa 'bebs/ / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zhi mdzad zad mi shes/ / rdul dang dri med 'di yi mtshan la 'jug /

sems can thams cad mnyam med nyon mongs bsgribs/ / lam rgyud rgya mtsho'i sdug bsngal nang na 'khor/ / de dag la ni rgyal ba'i yul ston te; ; dpal bcu'i lha ni 'di la rab tu dga'/ /
bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po bsam yas su/ / rgyal bas spyod pa mi zad rnams spyad de/ / 'gro ba'i gti mug dkyil 'khor rnam par bzlog / rin chen zla ba'i dpal ni 'di la 'jug /
'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal chen po na/ / sems can 'khor zhing mi bde kun gzigs nas/ / rgyal bas bla na med pa'i lam yang bstan/ / klu dpal pad+mo gtsug phud 'di la dga'/ /
sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ / chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ / 'gro ba'i gti mug dra ba rnam par sbyong / / de skad chu 'dzin shugs ni smra zhing brjod/ /
sangs rgyas dra med bsam gyis mi khyab can/ / 'jig rten kun gyi yul du rnam par mdzes/ / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun la ston/ / sna tshogs dpal gyi me tog spyod yul lo/ /
bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad rgya che ba'ang / / 'byams klas thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis btul/ / rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab mi g.yo ste/ / rdo rje rdul 'dzin tshul ni 'di yin no/ /
chos kyi dbyings ni 'byams klas kun bkang zhang / / phyogs bcu rnams su rgyal ba'i gsung yang grag / sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes/ / 'di ltar 'di la sprin 'byung rab tu 'jug /

All sentient beings are shrouded by afflictions, Roaming in all conditions, subject to all miseries— For them he reveals the state of buddhahood: Palace in All Waters enters this door.
Buddha, in unthinkable oceans of eons, Cultivated all practices endlessly, Forever cutting the net of beings’ confusion: Jewel Moon can clearly enter this.
Buddha sees beings always afraid, Whirling in the ocean of birth and death; He shows them the Buddha’s unexcelled Way: Dragon Topknot, comprehending, gives rise to joy.
The realm of the Buddhas cannot be conceived— It is equal to the cosmos and space— It can clear away beings’ net of delusion: This Flower Holding is able to expound.
The Buddha-eye is pure and inconceivable: Comprehensively viewing all things, He points out to all the excellent paths: This Flower Light understands.
The army of demons, huge, uncountable, He destroys in the space of an instant, His mind undisturbed, unfathomable: This is Diamond Topknot’s technique.
Speaking a wondrous sound in the ten directions, That sound pervades the entire universe— Such is the Buddha’s meditation state: This is the realm of Ocean Tide Thunder.

de la chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi chu bo mtha' med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha ri dang chu kun la brten pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang 'grogs pa'i snying rje'i tshul gyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha nga ros khyab par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra yid du mi 'ong ba zlog cing phan pa skyed pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung bar mi nus pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel cing gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ thams cad tshim par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing 'khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang / khro ba'i shugs dang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/ /

Futhermore, the river spirit Everywhere Producing Swift Currents found the door of liberation everywhere raining the boundless rain of truth. The river spirit Universally Purifying Springs and Streams found the door of liberation appearing before all sentient beings and causing them to be forever free from afflictions. The river spirit Dustfree Pure Eye found the door of liberation by compassion and appropriate techniques washing away the dust of delusions from all sentient beings. The river spirit Roaring Everywhere found the door of liberation constantly producing sounds beneficial to all sentient beings. The river spirit Rescuing Sentient Beings Everywhere found the door of liberation always being nonmalevolent and kind toward all sentient beings. The river spirit Heatless Pure Light found the door of liberation showing all pure and cool roots of goodness. The river spirit Universally Causing Joy found the door of liberation cultivating complete generosity, causing all sentient beings to forever give up stinginess and attachment. The river spirit Supreme Banner of Extensive Virtue found the door of liberation being a field of blessings giving joy to all. The river spirit Light Shining on All Worlds found the door of liberation able to cause all defiled beings to be pure, and all those poisoned with anger to become joyful. The river spirit Light of Oceanic Virtues found the door of liberation able to cause all sentient beings to enter the ocean of liberation and always experience complete bliss.

de nas chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas / sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the river spirit Everywhere Producing Swift Currents, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the river spirits and spoke in verse,

chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa dag / sngon chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs/ / 'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa rnams/ / sprin chen char bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ /
bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal bas sngon/ / smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing / / 'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen/ / 'khyil ba zhes bya chu klung lha dga'o/ /
'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul bsgoms shing / / mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong / / yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta/ / de la dri med mig gi lha yang mos/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni/ / kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi/ / sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i yid/ / rnam thar 'di ni sgro dbyangs sgrog pas thos/ /
bskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don du/ / sngon chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong / / de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzes/ / lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dga'/ /
rgyal ba sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ / sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad/ / de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho sdug bsngal 'jil/ / zhi byed chu klung lha ni des dga'o/ /
sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang / / 'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing / / rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs pa yongs su bsal/ / kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo/ /
thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na/ / yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung / / rgyal bas 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de/ / rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'/ /
sgrib pa'i klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri/ / 'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas; ; mkha' mnyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes/ / rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o/ /
sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ / bsod nams zhing ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor/ / byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad/ / rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no/ /

Of old the Buddha, for the sake of all beings, Cultivated boundless practices of the ocean of truths; Like refreshing rain clearing blazing heat, He extinguishes the heat of beings’ afflictions.
Buddha, in uncountable past eons, Purified the world with the light of his vows, Causing the mature to realize enlightenment: This is the realization of Universal Purifier.
With compassion and methods numerous as beings He appears before all, always guiding, Clearing away the dirt of afflictions: Pure Eyes, seeing this, rejoices profoundly.
Buddhas speak of wondrous sound, causing all to hear— Sentient beings, delighted, have hearts full of joy, Causing them to wash away innumerable pains: This is the liberation of Everywhere Roaring.
The Buddha cultivated enlightenment practice To aid sentient beings for innumerable ages— Therefore his light fills the world: The spirit Guardian, remembering, is happy.
Buddha cultivated practices for the sake of beings, By various means making them mature, Purifying the ocean of blessings, removing all pains: Heatless, seeing this, rejoices at heart.
The gate of generosity is inexhaustible, Benefiting all sentient beings, Causing witnesses to have no attachment: This is the enlightenment of Universal Joy.
Buddha cultivated genuine methods of enlightenment, Developing a boundless ocean of virtues, Causing witnesses all to rejoice: This Supreme Banner happily realizes.
He clears away the defilements of beings, Equally compassionate even to the vicious, Therefore acquiring radiance filling all space: Light Shining on All Worlds sees and rejoices.
Buddha is the field of blessings, ocean of virtues, Able to cause all to abandon evil And even fulfill great enlightenment: This is the liberation of Ocean Light.

de la lo tog gi lha ngad 'jam pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi ngad mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par skyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o; ;

Furthermore, the crop spirit Gentle Superb Flavor found the door of liberation bestowing rich flavor on all sentient beings, causing them to develop a buddha-body. The crop spirit Pure Light of Seasonal Flowers found the door of liberation able to cause all sentient beings to experience great joy and happiness. The crop spirit Physical Strength Courage and Health found the door of liberation purifying all realms by means of all round, complete teachings. The crop spirit Increasing Vitality found the door of liberation seeing the boundless mystical powers compassionately used by the Buddha for edifying demonstrations. The crop spirit Everywhere Producing Roots and Fruits found the door of liberation everywhere revealing the Buddha’s field of blessings and causing seeds planted there not to spoil. The crop spirit Wonderfully Adorned Circular Topknot found the door of liberation causing the flower of pure faith of sentient beings everywhere to bloom. The crop spirit Moistening Pure Flowers found the door of liberation compassionately saving sentient beings and causing them to increase in blessings and virtue. The crop spirit Developing Wonderful Fragrance found the door of liberation extensively demonstrating all methods of enlightening practice. The crop spirit Liked by All Who See found the door of liberation able to cause all sentient beings in the universe to abandon such ills as sloth and anxiety and to become pure in all ways. The crop spirit Pure Light found the door of liberation observing the good roots of all sentient beings, explaining the truth to them in appropriate ways, bringing joy and fulfillment to the masses.
de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the crop spirit Gentle Superb Flavor, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the crop spirits and said,

rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa ni/ / 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te/ / ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed/ / bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med/ /
sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin/ / 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/ / chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed/ / dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug /
bder gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas/ / 'gro ba dag ni chos kyi legs pas mdzes/ / 'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam par snang / / stobs dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo/ /
sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i/ / thugs rje rgya mtsho sngon chad rnam sbyangs pas/ / de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnams ni mtha' yas so/ / de ni mdangs mthong lha yis rab tu mthong / /
thabs rnams kun gyi sgo rnams don yod par/ / sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab gyur cing / / 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad/ / 'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to/ /
'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa/ / de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus byung ste; ; de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho 'o/ / nags tshal rgyan gyi gtsug phud de la 'jug /
'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de/ / sems can rnams la phan phyir rang byung skyes/ / lam rab dge ba zhi la rab tu ston/ / zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to/ /
phyogs su sems can yongs smin byed pa'i tshe/ / bder gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa/ / byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung / / spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so/ /
rgyal bas 'jig rten yid du 'ong ba spong / / dge ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu skyed/ / 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong / / dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo/ /
'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags/ / skye bo kun gyi bsam pa des mkhyen te/ / sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad/ / rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to/ /

The Buddha’s ocean of unexcelled virtues Manifests a lamp which illumines the world: Saving and protecting all sentient beings, He gives them all peace, not leaving out one.
The Buddha’s virtues are boundless— No beings hear of them in vain— He causes them to be free from suffering and always happy: This is what Seasonal Flowers enters into.
The powers of the Buddha are all complete— His array of virtues appears in the world And all sentient beings are harmonized: To this fact Courageous Power can witness.
The Buddha cultivated an ocean of compassion, His heart always as broad as the whole world; Therefore his spiritual powers are boundless: Increasing Vitality can see this.
Buddha always appears throughout the world; None of his methods are employed in vain, Clearing away beings’ delusions and torments: This is the liberation of Universal Producer.
Buddha is the great ocean of knowledge in the world, Emanating pure light which reaches everywhere, Whence is born all great faith and resolution: Thus can Adorned Topknot clearly enter.
Buddha, observing the world, conceives kind compassion, Appearing in order to aid sentient beings, Showing them the supreme way of peace and joy: This is the liberation of Pure Flowers.
The pure practices cultivated by Buddha Are fully expounded under the tree of enlightenment, Thus edifying everyone in all quarters: This Wonderful Fragrance can hear.
Buddha, in all worlds, Brings freedom from sorrow, creating great joy; All potentials and aspirations he purifies: The spirit Pleasing understands this.
The Buddha appears in the world, Observes the inclinations of all beings, And matures them by various means: This is the liberation of Pure Light.

de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha tsan+dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ blta ba don yod pas sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ / sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba ldongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / sman gyi lha mdangs dang 'od kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the herb spirit Auspicious found the door of liberation observing the mentalities of all sentient beings and striving to unify them. The herb spirit Sandalwood Forest found the door of liberation embracing all sentient beings with light and causing those who see it not to waste the experience. The herb spirit Pure Light found the door of liberation able to annihilate the afflictions of all sentient beings by pure techniques. The herb spirit Universal Renown found the door of liberation able to increase the boundless ocean of good roots by means of a great reputation. The herb spirit Radiant Pores found the door of liberation hurrying to all sites of illness with the banner of great compassion. The herb spirit Darkness Destroying Purifier found the door of liberation able to cure all blind sentient beings and cause their eye of wisdom to be clear. The herb spirit Roarer found the door of liberation able to expound the verbal teaching of the Buddha explaining the different meanings of all things. The herb spirit Banner of Light Outshining the Sun found the door of liberation able to be the advisor of all sentient beings, causing all who see to produce roots of goodness. The herb spirit Seeing in All Directions found the door of liberation of the mine of pure compassion able to make beings give rise to faith and resolve by means of appropriate techniques. The herb spirit Everywhere Emanating Majestic Light found the door of liberation causing beings to remember Buddha, thereby eliminating their sicknesses.
de nas sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the herb spirit Auspicious, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the herb spirits and said,

sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ / 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ / thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas/ / sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grol/ /
sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab/ / de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod/ / skye rgu rnams ni sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/ / tsan+dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/ /
sngon chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos; ; bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang / / srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med/ / de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/ / mthong zhing mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon/ / tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de/ / de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug /
rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang / / nad las rab tu 'grel ba'i 'od bkye bas/ / 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad/ / sbu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no/ /
sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas/ / 'gro ba rtag tu ldongs shing rmongs gyur rnams/ / sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par sbyong / / de ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo/ /
rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i/ / chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung / / de ni sems can ma lus kun kyang shes/ / 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/ /
rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ / srid par sems can yongs su smin byas pa/ / de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang / / nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo/ /
sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste/ / 'gro ba kun phan don du de skyes so/ / 'gro ba kun la lam rnams shin tu ston/ / de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so/ /
sangs rgyas 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa/ / phyogs rnams thams cad ma lus kun tu gang / / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid skyed/ / mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to; ;

The Buddha’s knowledge is inconceivable— He knows the minds of all sentient beings, And by the power of various techniques Destroys their delusions and infinite pains.
The Great Hero’s skills cannot be measured; Nothing he does is ever in vain, Unfailingly causing the suffering of beings to vanish: Sandalwood Forest can understand this.
Observe the Buddha’s teaching like so: He practiced for innumerable eons And has no attachment to anything: This is the entry of Pure Light.
A Buddha is hard to meet, in a million ages; If any can see one or hear one’s name, It will unfailingly bring benefit: This is the understanding of Universal Renown.
Each of the Buddha’s hair pores Emits light annulling distress, Causing wordly afflictions to end: This is the entry of Radiant Pores.
All sentient beings are blinded by ignorance, With an infinite variety of miseries from deluded acts— Buddha clears it all away and opens the radiance of wisdom: This Darkness Breaker can see.
One tone of the Buddha has no limiting measure— It can open up the ocean of all teachings So that all who hear can comprehend: This is the liberation of Great Sound.
See how Buddha’s knowledge is inconceivable— Appearing in all realms he saves beings there, Able to make those who see follow his teaching: This Outshining the Sun deeply understands.
Buddha’s ocean of compassionate means Is produced to help the world, Opening the right path wide to show beings: This Seeing in All Directions can comprehend.
Buddha emits great light all around Illumining all in the ten directions, Causing virtue to grow as the Buddha’s remembered: This is the liberation door of Majestic Light.

de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen po kun nas spungs pa'i shugs zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o; ; nags tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po'i ngad ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyas par yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the forest spirit Spreading Flowers like Clouds found the door of liberation of the repository of the vast, boundless sea of knowledge. The forest spirit Outstanding Trunk Unfolding Light found the door of liberation of great cultivation and universal purification. The forest spirit Bearing Branches Emitting Radiant Light found the door of liberation increasing the growth of all sorts of sprouts of pure faith. The forest spirit Auspicious Pure Leaves found the door of liberation arrayed with all pure virtues. The forest spirit Draped Flame Treasury found the door of liberation of universal wisdom always viewing the entire cosmos. The forest spirit Pure Arrays of Light found the door of liberation knowing the ocean of all sentient beings’ activities and producing and spreading clouds of teaching. The forest spirit Pleasant Thunder found the door of liberation enduring all unpleasant sounds and producing pure sounds. The forest spirit Light and Fragrance All-Pervading found the door of liberation showing the vast realm of practices cultivated and mastered in the past. The forest spirit Subtle Light Shining Far found the door of liberation benefiting the world by means of all virtuous qualities. The forest spirit Flowers and Fruits Savoring of Light found the door of liberation able to cause all to see the Buddha appearing in the world, to always remember with respect and never forget, and adorn the mine of virtues.

de nas nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the forest spirit Spreading Flowers like Clouds, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the forest spirits and said,

bsod nams stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams dang / / sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung / / stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin/ / 'gro ba kun na 'phags shing rnam par mdzes/ /
'gro ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo/ / de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs/ / rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ / sna tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag / mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur/ / rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston/ / myu gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar yin; ;
rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor/ / bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te/ / 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ / rnam thar 'di ni phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthong / /
sngon chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams/ / zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran/ / kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs/ / yal ga 'od kyi brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo/ /
'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag / skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud/ / rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu yangs/ / sna tshogs rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo/ /
bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung / / dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed/ / sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes/ / 'di ni sgra rnams sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos/ /
phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing / / sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung / / rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston/ / kun tu dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug /
ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams/ / myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag / de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston/ / 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo/ /
sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa rnams/ / bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ / gzhan ni bder gshegs skad cig gcig gis lta/ / ro yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo/ /

In the past Buddha cultivated enlightening practices; His virtue and wisdom are thoroughly complete, He has all powers fully in command— Emitting great light, he appears in the world.
The aspects of his compassion are as infinite as beings— Buddha purified them all in eons past, And therefore is able to bring aid to the world: This is the understanding of Outstanding Trunk.
Once sentient beings see the Buddha, He’ll plunge them into the ocean of faith, Showing to all the enlightening way: This is the liberation of Wonderful Branches.
The virtues amassed in a single pore Could not be all told of in an ocean of eons— The Buddha’s techniques are inconceivable: Pure Leaves can understand this teaching.
I recall the Buddha in the past Made offerings to infinite numbers of Buddhas, His knowledge gradually becoming clearer with each: This is what Store of Flames understands.
The ocean of actions of all sentient beings The Buddha knows in an instant of thought; Such vast unhindered knowledge Beautiful Adornments can begin to realize.
Always intoning the Buddha’s serene, sublime sound Produces incomparable joy everywhere, Causing all to awaken according to their understanding and inclination: This is the principle of Thunder Sound’s practice.
The Buddha shows great mystic powers All throughout the ten directions, Causing all his past deeds to be seen: This is where All-Pervading Light and Fragrance enters.
Sentient beings are dishonest and don’t practice virtue— Lost and deluded, they sink and flow in birth and death; For them he clearly opens the paths of knowledge: This is seen by Subtle Light.
Buddha, for the sake of beings blocked by habits, Appears in the world after millions of eons, Causing them to see always for the rest of time: This is observed by Savor of Light.

de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o; ; ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / ri'i lha kun nas sra ba'i rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the mountain spirit Jewel Peak Blooming Flowers found the door of liberation entering the light of absorption in great quiescence. The mountain spirit Flower Forest Topknot found the door of liberation cultivating and collecting good roots of kindness and developing an inconceivable number of beings to maturity. The mountain spirit Lofty Banner Shining Everywhere found the door of liberation looking into the inclinations of all sentient beings and purifying their senses. The mountain spirit Undefiled Jewel Topknot found the door of liberation of boundless eons of diligent striving without becoming weary or remiss. The mountain spirit Light Illumining All Directions found the door of liberation awakening all with lights of infinite qualities. The mountain spirit Light of Great Power found the door of liberation of capability of self-development and causing sentient beings to give up deluded behavior. The mountain spirit Awesome Light Conquering All found the door of liberation removing all pains so that none are left. The mountain spirit Light-Orb of Subtle Intensity found the door of liberation spreading the light of the teachings, showing the virtues of all Buddhas. The mountain spirit Universal Eye Clearly Seeing found the door of liberation causing all sentient beings to make their roots of goodness grow even in dreams. The mountain spirit Adamantine Eye of Mystery found the door of liberation bringing forth a great ocean of meaning.

de nas ri'i lha rin po che rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time, the mountain spirit Blooming Flowers All Over the Earth, imbued with power from the Buddha, surveyed all the hosts of mountain spirits and said in verse,

rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos/ / sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod/ / rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgoms mdzad pas/ / 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang bskyed/ /
sangs rgyas spu nas dri med dpal bkye ba/ / yan lag mtshan rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / / byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston/ / nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar to; ;
sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon/ / 'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags/ / dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'/ / rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug /
rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags/ / bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo/ / sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor ba ma lus 'dul/ / dga' ba dri med gtsug phud rnam thar to/ /
'jig rten kun ni ldongs gyur mun stug zhugs/ / thugs rje der bskyed sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing / / 'gro khams yun ring nyal ba sad par mdzad/ / rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to/ /
srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe/ / zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas/ / de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod/ / zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug go /
las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing bsgribs pa rnams/ / srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas/ / de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal/ / gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems so; ;
rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun/ / phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag / rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas/ / 'od mang rdul gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go /
sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun/ / de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang / / sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston/ / tshul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos so/ /
chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa/ / sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung / / bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang la ston/ / rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug /

Having cultivated excellent practices without bound, Now he has attained mystic powers, also infinite. His gates of teaching are wide open, numerous as atoms, Causing all sentient beings to deeply understand and rejoice.
His body, adorned in many ways, is omnipresent, The lights from his pores are all pure; With compassionate techniques he teaches all: Flower Forest Topknot understands this.
The Buddha-body appears everywhere—it’s boundless, Filling all worlds in the ten directions, All faculties pure, a joy to all beholders: This truth High Banner can understand.
For eons practicing diligently without flagging, Unaffected by worldly things, like empty space, By various means he edifies beings: Realizing this is Jewel Topknot.
Sentient beings blindly enter dangerous paths; Pitying them, Buddha emits shining light, Causing all beings thereby to awake: Awesome Light, understanding this, rejoices.
Extensively cultivating practices in all states of being, He made offerings to innumerable Buddhas, Causing beings who saw to make great vows: This Great Power can clearly enter.
Seeing beings’ sufferings in transmigration, Always enshrouded by barriers of doing, He extinguishes all with the light of wisdom: This is the liberation of Conquering All.
Each of his pores emits subtle sound Praising the Buddhas in accord with beings’ mentalities, Pervading all quarters, for uncounted ages: This is the door by which Light Orb has entered.
Buddha appears throughout the ten directions Expounding the subtle truth by various means, With an ocean of practices aiding all beings: This is what Clearly Seeing has understood.
The gates of the teaching are boundless as the sea— He expounds it with one voice, making all understand, Preaching forever, with never an end: Delving into this technique is Diamond Eye.

de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o/ / sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs sgom pa rnam par 'byed pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun sgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the earth spirit Pure Flower of Universal Virtue found the door of liberation constantly watching all sentient beings with an attitude of kindness and compassion. The earth spirit Adornment of Stable Blessings found the door of liberation manifesting the power of blessings and virtues of all sentient beings. The earth spirit Beautiful Flower Adorned Tree found the door of liberation entering into all things and producing adornment for all buddha-fields. The earth spirit Universal Distribution of Treasures found the door of liberation cultivating and producing various states of meditation and causing sentient beings to get rid of obstructing defilements. The earth spirit Pure Eye Observing the Season found the door of liberation causing all sentient beings to sport happily. The earth spirit Beautiful Golden Eyes found the door of liberation manifesting all pure bodies and harmonizing sentient beings. The earth spirit Fragrant Hair Emitting Light found the door of liberation of great power comprehending the ocean of virtues of all Buddhas. The earth spirit Silent Pleasing Sound found the door of liberation holding the ocean of speech-sounds of all sentient beings. The earth spirit Curled Topknot of Beautiful Flowers found the door of liberation of the undefiled nature pervading all Buddha-fields. The earth spirit Indestructible All-Sustainer found the door of liberation revealing all that is contained in the cycles of teaching of all Buddhas.

de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i lha'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time, the earth spirit Pure Flower of Universal Virtue, imbued with power from the Buddha, looked over all the earth spirits and said,

sngon chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis; ; brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang / / byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/ / de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra/ /
dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang / / ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag / rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od/ / bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /
'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med/ / ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/ / sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston/ / 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no/ /
sngon chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang / / 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par zlog pa ni/ / rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te/ / rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te/ / 'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston/ / dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha/ / dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta/ /
sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab/ / sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ / gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar/ / sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba ste/ /
sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su/ / phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad/ / spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha/ / sangs rgyas sems can 'dul ba de la lta/ /
phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing / / 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod/ / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha/ / rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/ /
rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi/ / spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang zhing / / sems can ma lus yongs su smin mdzad pa/ / me tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong / /
de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste/ / mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra/ / 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus/ / rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o/ /

The doors of compassion opened by the Buddha In every moment of the past cannot be all told of; He cultivated such practice unceasingly, Therefore he has an indestructible body.
The store of blessings of all Sentient beings in all times, as well as enlightening beings, All appear in the Buddha’s pores: Adornment of Blessings, seeing this, rejoices.
His vast state of serene absorption Is unborn, imperishable, has no coming or going; Yet he purifies lands to show sentient beings: This is the liberation of Flowered Tree.
Buddha cultivated various practices To make sentient beings dissolve all barriers; Universal Distributor of Treasure Sees this liberation and rejoices.
The sphere of the Buddha is boundless— He appears every moment throughout the world: Observing the Season with Pure Eyes, Seeing Buddha’s realm of action, is joyful.
His sublime voice is limitless and inconceivable— He destroys afflictions for all sentient beings: Diamond Eye can realize this, Seeing Buddha’s boundless supreme virtues.
He appears in disguise in all kinds of forms, All throughout the universe: Fragrant Hair Emitting Light always sees Buddha, Thus teaching all sentient beings.
His sublime voice extends everywhere, Explaining for beings for infinite eons: Pleasing Sound earth spirit comprehends this, And, hearing it from the Buddha, is reverently joyful.
Buddha’s pores emit clouds of fragrant flames Filling the world according to the mentalities of beings; All who see this develop maturity: This is what Flower Swirl observes.
Stable and unbreakable as diamond, More unshakable than the polar mountain, The Buddha’s body is in the world this way: All-Sustainer, able to see, gives rise to joy.

de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni; thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri ma rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/ / grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /

Furthermore, the city spirit Jewel Peak Radiance found the door of liberation benefiting sentient beings by appropriate means. The city spirit Beautifully Adorned Palace found the door of liberation knowing the faculties of sentient beings and teaching and maturing them. The city spirit Jewel of Pure Joy found the door of liberation always joyfully causing all sentient beings to receive various blessings. The city spirit Sorrowless Purity found the door of liberation of the mine of great compassion saving those in fear. The city spirit Flower Lamp Flame Eyes found the door of liberation of universally clear great wisdom and knowledge. The city spirit Flame Banner Clearly Showing found the door of liberation appearing everywhere with appropriate means. The city spirit Light of Virtue found the door of liberation observing all sentient beings and causing them to cultivate the vast ocean of virtue. The city spirit Body of Pure Light found the door of liberation awakening all sentient beings from the darkness of ignorance. The city spirit Eyes of Light of a Mountain of Jewels found the door of liberation able to pulverize the mountains of obstructions hindering sentient beings, by means of a great light.

de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
At that time the city spirit Jewel Peak Radiance, imbued with power from the Buddha, surveyed all the hosts of city spirits and said in verse,

mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ / snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ / sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i/ / sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang / /
sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te/ / de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen/ / rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ / sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'/ /
rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad/ / sngon chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung / / dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs; ; rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob/ /
'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing / / de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad sems can rnams; ; kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog / nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'/ /
rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te/ / tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas/ / mar me me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o/ /
de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams/ / 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan/ / de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu sgom pa yis/ / mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'/ /
bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa/ / sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs/ / de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas/ / bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'/ /
srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams; ; 'khor gyur rab rib ldongs pa gzigs pas na/ / de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung / / dri med 'od kyis rnam thar 'di thob bo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos/ / 'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ / de dag bstan cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul/ / spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo/ /
sems can rmongs pa mun pas ldongs gyur cing / / rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur/ / rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug /

The Guide is so inconceivable, With light illumining the ten directions: All sentient beings see Buddha before them, Teaching and developing countless numbers.
The faculties of sentient beings are each different; The Buddha knows them all. The spirit Beautifully Adorned Palaces Enters this gate of teaching with joy.
The Buddha cultivated practices for boundless eons, Maintaining the teachings of the Buddhas of past ages, His mind always happily accepting them: Jewel of Joy realizes this way.
Buddha in the past was already able to remove The fears of all sentient beings And always exercise kindness and compassion toward them: This the spirit Sorrowless comprehends with joy.
Buddha’s knowledge is vast and boundless; Like space, it cannot be measured. Flower Eyes, realizing this, is pleased: He can study the Buddha’s ineffable wisdom.
