“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called All-Illuminating Light of Ornaments of All Jewels, bounded by an atmosphere of perfume, resting on garlands of various gems, octagonal in shape, covered by clouds of solar discs of crystals with subtle light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in three buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Banner of Supreme Knowledge Like Pure Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer dang / rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Flowers of Various Lights, bounded by all the finest jewels, resting on a sea of pure banners of multicolored diamonds, shaped like a crystal lotus blossom, covered by clouds of diamond light, orbited by worlds as numerous as atoms in four buddha-fields, all thoroughly pure. The Buddha is called Diamond Light with Infinite Energy Skillfully Producing Manifestations.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad nas gra du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa; 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiating Light of Beautiful Flowers, bounded by nets adorned with bells of all jewels, resting on a sea of networks of jewel spheres adorned with forests of all trees, geometric in shape, with many angles and sides, covered by clouds of diamonds with pure resonance, surrounded by worlds as many as atoms in five buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Ocean of Joyful Power of Fragrant Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che shi la'i rgyal mtshan gyi sa mtshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Subtle Light, bounded by banners decorated with diamonds, resting on a sea of diamond palaces, square in shape, covered by clouds of drapes of crystal orb topknots, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in six buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Banner of Sovereignty with Universal Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog pad+mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / rin po che'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang / mu tig dang / stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Radiance of Myriad Flowers, bounded by decorations of all kinds of flowers, resting on a sea of flames of the colors of all jewels, shaped like a palace, covered by clouds of robes of the colors of all jewels and railings of pearls, surrounded by worlds as numerous as atoms in seven buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Ocean of Joy with the Light of Virtue, Fame, and Freedom.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo la 'dug cing / nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing the State of Awesome Power, bounded by ornaments of diamonds that produce all sounds, resting on a sea of spheres of lotus thrones of the colors of various jewels, shaped like Indra’s net, covered by clouds of flower webs of boundless colors, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in eight buddha fields. The Buddha is called Renowned Banner of the Ocean of Knowledge.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Wondrous Sounds, bounded by spherical arrays of mind-jewels, resting on a sea of diamonds in cloudlike arrays constantly producing all wonderful sounds, shaped like the body of a celestial king of the Brahma heaven, covered by clouds of lion thrones adorned with countless jewels, surrounded by as many worlds as there are atoms in nine buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Invincible Radiance like Pure Moonlight.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ spos dang / nor bu dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Diamond Banner, bounded by garlands of gems from pearl treasuries of boundless adornments, resting on a crystal sea of jewel lion thrones with all adornments, spherical in shape, covered by mountainous clouds of jewel flowers of all fragrances, as numerous as atoms in ten gigantic mountains, and surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Supreme King of the Ocean of All Truths.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i bla res kun nas yog ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, there is a world called Constantly Producing Sapphire Light, bounded by arrays of indestructible diamonds, resting on a sea of various different flowers, shaped like the half moon, covered by clouds of drapes of celestial jewels, surrounded by worlds as many as atoms in eleven buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Boundless Virtues.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi klong can gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Light Shining, bounded by arrays of radiant lights, resting on a sea of perfume of flower swirls, shaped like a wreath, covered by clouds of various garments, surrounded by worlds as numerous as atoms in twelve buddha-fields. The Buddha is named Transcending the Gods.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams can/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can gyi shin tu gzung ba/ pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ nam mkha' lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, we come to this world, called Endurance, bounded by ornaments of diamonds, held by atmospheres of various colors, resting on a network of lotus flowers, shaped like space, covered by space adorned with spherical celestial palaces, surrounded by worlds as numerous as atoms in thirteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is this Vairocana.

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Tranquil Undefiled Light, bounded by adornments of all jewels, resting on a sea of various kinds of precious raiment, shaped like a thunderbolt-bearer, covered by clouds of diamonds of boundless colors, surrounded by worlds as numerous as atoms in fourteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Supreme Sound Pervading the Cosmos.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can/ me tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lamp of Many Beautiful Light Beams, bounded by drapes of all ornaments, resting on a sea of webs of pure flowers, shaped like a fylfot, covered by clouds of seas of crystal trees and perfumed waters, surrounded by as many worlds as atomic particles in fifteen buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Universally Illuminating Banner of Invincible Strength.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbal gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan+dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Light Shining Everywhere, bounded by diamonds from inexhaustible clouds of jewels, resting on a sea of lotus flowers with various fragrant flames, shaped like a tortoise shell, covered by sandalwood clouds of radiant crystal orbs, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in sixteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Eyes with the Qualities of Pure Suns.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog dang shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mine of Jewel Ornaments, bounded by diamonds in the forms of all living beings, resting on a sea of diamonds from mines of light, octagonal in shape, covered by webs of flower trees adorned by jewels from all the surrounding mountains, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in seventeen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Light of Unhindered Knowledge Illumining the Ten Directions.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ me tog gi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs mu tig gi phreng ba bskyil ba lta bur 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Dustless, bounded by ornaments of all kinds of exquisite forms, resting on a sea of lion thrones of myriad beautiful flowers, shaped like a pearl necklace, covered by clouds of auras of diamonds with all precious fragrances, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in eighteen buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Supreme Banner of Infinite Means.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Light Illumining Everywhere, bounded by diamonds producing inexhaustible clouds of jewels, resting on a sea of mountains of fragrant flames of infinite colors, shaped like a wreath of jewel flowers, covered by diamond clouds of light of boundless colors, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in nineteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Light Illumining All the Space of the Cosmos.

de'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lha'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Beautiful Jewel Flames, bounded by jewels like the sun and moon illuming everywhere, resting on a sea of diamonds in the shapes of all celestial beings, shaped like jewel arrays, covered by clouds of banners of all precious robes and networks of banks of crystal lamps, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Shining with Signs of Virtue.

'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byams klas pa/ gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs gzhan can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byams klas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste; de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa rnam par gdags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o; ; 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa/ chu klung gi glong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go /

“This world system, Blazing Light Illumining the Ten Directions, has as many such vast worlds as there are atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields, each with their individual resting places, shapes, substances and natures, aspects, entrances, adornments, boundaries, arrays, similarities, and powers of maintenance, all revolving around it: that is, there are as many spiral-shaped worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, a like number of river-shaped worlds, the same number of whirlpool-shaped worlds, the same number of wheel-rim-shaped worlds, the same number of altar-shaped worlds, the same number of forest-shaped worlds, the same number of tower-shaped worlds, the same number of forest-shaped worlds, the same number of pennant-shaped worlds, the same number of womb-shaped worlds, the same number of geometrically shaped worlds, the same number of lotus-blossom-shaped worlds, the same number of basket-shaped worlds, the same number of worlds shaped like living creatures, the same number of Buddha-shaped worlds, the same number of light aura-shaped worlds, the same number of cloud-shaped worlds, the same number of net-shaped worlds, the same number of door-shaped worlds—there are as many such as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields. Each of these worlds has as many enormous worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields surrounding it, each one also having as many worlds, the same as explained above. All of these worlds are in this Boundless Light of Beautiful Flowers sea of fragrant waters, or in the rivers of fragrant water surrounding it.”

spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+mo chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can yod do; ; de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ 'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ pad+mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

Then the enlightening being Universally Good also said to the great assembly, “East of this Boundless Light of Beautiful Flowers sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water called Repository of Undefiled Flames. It produces huge lotuses called Beautiful Adornments of Diamonds with All Scents. There is a world system resting on it called Vortex of Lands Shining Everywhere. Its substance is the roaring sound of deeds of enlightening beings. At its bottom is a world called Palace Decoration Banner, square in shape, resting on a sea of ornaments of all precious stones, covered by clouds of webs of lotus light, surrounded by worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is named Brow-Light Illumining Everywhere.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dpal gyi seng+ge'i khri'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so//

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Repository of Flowers of Virtue, spherical in shape, resting on a sea of flower pistils made of all kinds of pearls, covered by clouds of lion thrones with pearl banners, orbited by as many worlds as atoms in two buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Wisdom of the Ocean of All Boundless Truths.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Fragrant Circle of Miracles, shaped like a diamond, resting on a sea of nets of chimes adorned with all kinds of jewels, covered by clouds of auras of all kinds of ornaments, orbited by as many worlds as atoms in three buddha-fields. The Buddha is named Light of Virtuous Characteristics Shining Everywhere.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Light of Sublime Color, shaped like a crystal orb, resting on a perfume sea of jewels of boundless colors, covered by clouds of palaces of radiant pearls, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in four buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is named Ubiquitous Illumination Producing Good Company.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer rdul dang bral ba/ dang / spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Good Cover, shaped like a lotus blossom, resting on a perfume sea of diamonds, covered by perfume clouds of undefiled light, orbited by as many worlds as atoms in five buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Inexhaustible Wisdom of Delight in Truth.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Wreath of Light of Pure Flowers, triangular in shape, resting on arrays of all unbreakable jewels, covered by light beams from the jeweled crowns of enlightening beings, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in six buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Pure Universal Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Jewel Lotus Blossoms, shaped like a half moon, resting on a sea of arrays of all kinds of lotuses, covered by clouds of flowers of all jewels, orbited by as many worlds as atoms in seven buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Pure Eye of Flowers of Virtue.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Repository of Undefiled Flames, shaped like a row of jewel lamps, resting on a sea of banks of jewellike flames, covered by clouds of various bodies constantly raining perfume, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in eight buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Invincible Power Of Wisdom.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sublime Pure Sound, shaped like a fylfot, resting on a sea of jewel raiment, covered with clouds of drapes adorned with all flowers, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in nine buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Enormous Eyes like the Clear Moon in the Sky.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sounds as Numerous as Atoms, shaped like the net of Indra, resting on a sea of waters of all precious elements, covered by clouds of jeweled canopies of all musical sounds, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Golden Mountain Lamp.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi ma'i sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyibs su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Jewel Colors, shaped like a fylfot, resting on a sea of gems shaped like the king of the gods, covered by clouds of flowers radiant as the sun, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in eleven buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Radiant Knowledge Illuminating the Cosmos.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Golden Light, shaped like a huge castle, resting on a sea of ornaments made of all jewels, covered by clouds of jewel flowers from scenes of enlightenment, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twelve buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Banner of Precious Lamps Lighting All.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi ze ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sphere of Light Illumining Everywhere, shaped like a wreath of flowers, resting on a sea of whirlpools of jewel raiment, covered by clouds of palaces made of diamonds emanating the sound of Buddha’s voice, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in thirteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Lotus Flower Illumining Everywhere.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ gling bzhi'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Mine Ornaments, shaped like four continents, resting on a mountain of jewel necklaces, covered by clouds of blazing jewels, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in fourteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Blooming Flowers of Inexhaustible Blessings.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje'i pad+mo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprin rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Appearing Everywhere like Reflections in a Mirror, shaped like the body of a titan, resting on a sea of diamond lotuses, covered by clouds of light rays from jeweled crowns, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in fifteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Elixir Sound.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje ltar ma khregs pa'i tsan+dan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi me tog mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sandalwood Moon, octagonal in shape, resting on a sea of indestructible precious sandalwood, covered by clouds of pearl flowers, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in sixteen buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Peerless Knowledge of the Supreme Truth.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa; rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ spos chu'i klong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Untainted Light, shaped like a whirlpool of fragrant water, resting on a sea of jewel light of boundless colors, covered by clouds of exquisitely aromatic light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in seventeen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Sound of Light Illumining All Space.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas dran pa'i klong gi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Beautiful Flowers, spiral shaped, resting on a sea of all flowers, covered by crystal clouds of all musical sounds, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in eighteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Everywhere Manifesting Supreme Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rtul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ gser gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng+ge'i khri pad+mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Supreme Sounds, shaped like a lion throne, resting on a sea of golden lion thrones, covered by clouds of banks of lotuses of all colors, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in nineteen buddha-fields. The Buddha is called Universal Light of Renown for Boundless Virtue.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma nam mkha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Supremely High Lamp, shaped like the Buddha’s palm, resting on a sea of banners of perfume of precious raiment, covered by clouds of palaces made of jewels radiant as the sun, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Lamp Illuminating Space.

de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so/ / de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“South of this Repository of Undefiled Flames sea of fragrant waters is another sea of fragrant waters, called Sphere of Inexhaustible Light, with a world system called Array of Banners of Buddhas, composed of the sounds of the ocean of virtues of all Buddhas. At the bottom of this world system is a world called Lovely Flower, shaped like a jewel disc, resting on a sea of diamonds from a mine of diamond trees, covered by clouds of jewel mines projecting reflections of forms of enlightening beings, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Joyful Countenance of Lotus Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan mthun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sublime Sound; the Buddha there is called Wonderfully High Jewel Lamp.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Light of Arrays of Myriad Jewels; the Buddha there is called Banner of Sounds of the Cosmos.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Diamond Treasury of Fragrance; the Buddha there is called Sound of Light.
gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Sound; the Buddha there is called Supreme Energy.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Jewel Lotus Blossoms; the Buddha there is called Thunder of Clouds of Castles of Truth.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Peace and Bliss; the Buddha there is called Renowned Lamp of Wisdom.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Undefiled Net; the Buddha there is called Ocean of Virtues with Invincible Light.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog pad+mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Flowering Grove Banner Illumining Everywhere; the Buddha there is called Light of the Lotus of Great Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Innumerable Adornments; the Buddha there is called Banner of the Real Sphere of the Universal Eye.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Jewels of Radiant Light; the Buddha there is called Great Caravan Leader of Supreme Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Flower King; the Buddha there is called Moonlight Banner.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Undefiled Treasury; the Buddha there is called Pure Awareness.

gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Light; the Buddha there is called Lamp of the Space of Omniscience.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glog gi phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Jewel Necklaces; the Buddha there is called Light of the Forms of the Ocean of Virtues of the Ways of Transcendence.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshon gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sublime Circles Covering All; the Buddha there is called Subduing All Attached Minds and Causing Joy.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan yangs pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Flower Banner; the Buddha there is called Great Fame of Extensive Virtues.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Infinite Adornments; the Buddha there is called Ocean of Qualities of Light of Impartial Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Banner of Arrays of Infinite Lights, shaped like a lotus blossom, resting on a sea of webs of all jewels, covered by webs of lotus light crystals, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Pure Light of the Cosmos.

de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'od na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba pad+mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i klong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dmigs pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so; ;

“Turning the right of this Sphere of Inexhaustible Light sea of fragrant water, there is a sea of fragrant water called Diamond Flame Light, with a system of worlds called Repository of Arrays of Buddha Halos, composed of voices extolling the names of all Buddhas. At the bottom of this world system is a world called Jewel Flame Lotus, shaped like a curl of hair, the color of crystal, resting on a sea of whirlpools of the colors of all jewels, covered by clouds of palaces of all adornments, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Undefiled Jewel Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world caled Repository of Flames of Light; the Buddha there is called Light of Unhindered Independent Wisdom.

gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Beautiful Array of Jewel Discs; the Buddha there is called Light of All Jewels.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sandalwood Tree Flower Banner; the Buddha is called Light of Pure Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Exquisite Array of Buddha-Fields; the Buddha is called Great Sound of Joy.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Subtle Lights; the Buddha is called Independent Knowledge of the Cosmos.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Boundless Forms; the Buddha is called Unimpeded Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Flame Cloud Banner; the Buddha is called Nonregressive Teaching.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Circle of Jewel Ornaments; the Buddha is called Pure Flower Light.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byams klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Great Emancipation; the Buddha is called Eye of the Sun of Unhindered Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Beautifully Adorned Diamond Throne; the Buddha is called Great Light of Knowledge of the Cosmos.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Everywhere Adorned by Knowledge and Wisdom; the Buddha there is called King of the Light of the Torch of Knowledge.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Deep Wonderful Sound of a Lotus Pond; the Buddha there is called Omniscience Illumining Everywhere.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Varicolored Light Beams; the Buddha there is called Radiant Flower King Cloud.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Exquisite Jewel Banner; the Buddha there is called Light of Virtue.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu rab tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Crystal Flower Light; the Buddha there is called Cloud of Universal Sound.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Extremely Deep Ocean; the Buddha there is called Leader of All Beings in the Ten Directions.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called High Mountain Light; the Buddha there is called Sound of Universal Knowledge of the Cosmos.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi pad+mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Golden Lotus; the Buddha there is called Universal Light of the Repository of Virtue.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan dang / spos dang; nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas dpal chen po'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mine of Jewel Ornaments, shaped like a fylfot, resting on a sea of trees of all scents adorned by crystals, covered by clouds of pure light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha is called Web of Light of Great Mystical Displays.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+d+ra nI las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi pad+mo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can mngon par 'byung ba yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad pad+mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Diamond Flame Light sea of fragrant water, there is another sea of fragrant water called Sapphire Array, with a world system called Light Illumining the Ten Directions, resting on clouds of scent of lotus blossoms of all beautiful adornments, composed of the voices of boundless Buddhas. At the bottom of this system is a world called Wheel Containing Infinite Colors of All Quarters, shaped like a spiral with an infinite number of turns, resting on a sea of treasuries of jewels of unlimited colors, covered by the net of Indra, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Lotus Eyes with All-Illuminating Light.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mine of Pure Exquisite Ornaments; the Buddha there is called Great Lion of Unexcelled Wisdom.

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i gdan yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byams klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past worlds as numerous as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Lotus Thrones; the Buddha is called King of of Light Illumining the Cosmos.

gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Banner Sound; the Buddha there is called Universal Repute of Great Virtue.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Diamond Ornament Treasury; the Buddha there is called Lotus Sun Light.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Indra Flower Moon; the Buddha there is called Banner of Independent Knowledge of Truth.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Treasury of Beautiful Globes; the Buddha there is called Pure Sound of Great Joy.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mine of Wonderful Sounds; the Buddha there is called Good Caravan Leader of Great Power.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs ri rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Moon; the Buddha there is called Power of Knowledge with Monumental Light.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Boundless Adorning Marks; the Buddha there is called Pure Moonlight of Means and Vows.
bam po bcu pa/

gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i smon lam rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Beautiful Flower Sound; the Buddha there is called Sound of Great Vows of the Ocean of Truth.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi klong gis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of All Jewelry; the Buddha there is called Supreme Heaven of Beautiful Sound.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sra zhing mi shigs pa'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Indestructible Ground; the Buddha there is called Form of Jewel Light of Virtue.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Universal Light Readily Transforming; the Buddha there is called Calm Intellect with Great Energy.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bsrungs pas spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Protective Adorning Action; the Buddha there is called Gladdening to See.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams in+d+ra nI la dang / tsan+dan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba zab pa 'od zer rnam par snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sandalwood Jewel Flower Treasury; the Buddha there is called All-Illumining Light of Extremely Profound Immutable Wisdom.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od rab tu 'gyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sea of Various Colors and Forms; the Buddha there is called Radiating Soverign Light of Inconceivable Ultimate Truth.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i sprul pa shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi gzi brjid dam pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Great Lights in All Directions; the Buddha there is called Incomparable Majestic Light of Supreme Virtue.
de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mountain Cloud Banner; the Buddha there is called Eyes of Ultimately Pure Light.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos dang / nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa/ rgyan dang theg pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiant Lotus, round in shape, resting on a sea of crystals of boundless colors and many wonderful fragrances, covered by clouds of ornaments of all vehicles, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Energetic Sun of Liberation.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje brtan pas bsgrubs pa gzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul rnam par phye ba'i dra ba'i bye brag ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi lhun can yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i dra ba 'khor lo'i sprin ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ man shel gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtshos brtan pa/ ri rab kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul mig 'phrul lta bu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kun nas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Sapphire Array sea of fragrant water there is another sea of fragrant water, called Diamond Orb Adorned Floor, with a world system called Indra’s Net Studded with Wonderful Jewels, composed of sounds produced by the knowledge of universal virtue. At the bottom of this world system is a world called Lotus Blossom Net, shaped like the polar mountain, resting on a sea of banners of mountains of beautiful flowers, covered by clouds of Indra’s nets of diamonds from the sphere of buddhahood, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Wisdom Universally Aware of the Body of Reality.

gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer phra mo mi zad pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa dam pa'i mchog shin tu yangs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi chu bo kun nas snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po bla na med pa'i sprin mi zad pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing dang me tog nye bar gyur pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gis yog pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i 'khor lor dbyangs rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus shin tu thugs su chud pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mdzes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs par 'gro ba mngon du ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams seng+ge'i dpal gyi 'od dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od dri ma med pa nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che mang po rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i blo gros kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi snang zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dang dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid kun tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro mthon po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sprul pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snying pos brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa med par mkhas pas spyod pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi klong rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la thugs brtse ba'i rnam par thar pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim dga' bas rab tu brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyan pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / mthong ba don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang / nor bu mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ; de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun tu lta ba'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ lus dang khyim sna tshogs kyi spos kyi chu po la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par rgyal ba rab tu phye ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i sa dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Endless Sunlight; the Buddha there is called Mind of Supremely Great Awareness.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiating Subtle Light in All Directions; the Buddha there is called Endless Power of Clouds of Great Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Tree Blossom Banner; the Buddha there is called Sound of the Cosmos of Boundless Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pearl Canopy; the Buddha there is called Transcendental Lion Stretch.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Boundless Sound; the Buddha there is called Omniscient Awareness.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Forested Peak Visible Everywhere; the Buddha there is called Appearing before All Beings.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Invincible Light of Indra’s Net; the Buddha is called Clouds of Flames of Golden Light from a Spotless Sun.
“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Studded; the Buddha there is called Supreme Wisdom.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Ground of Undefiled Light; the Buddha there is called Pure Moon With All Powers.
“Above this, past worlds as many as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Constantly Emitting Sounds Praising Buddhas’ Virtues; the Buddha there is called Spacelike Mind of Universal Awareness.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called High Bank of Flames; the Buddha there is called Great Cloud Banners Majestically Appearing in All Quarters.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sanctuary Adorned with Light; the Buddha there is called Incomparable Knowledge Illumining Everywhere.
