“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Ornaments of All Jewels; the Buddha there is called King of Mystic Powers Widely Liberating Sentient Beings.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Beautiful Palace Adorned With Light; the Buddha there is called Vast Intellect Establishing All Truths.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Undefiled Tranquility; the Buddha there is called Not Appearing In Vain.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Banner of Crystal Flowers; the Buddha there is called Auspicious Sound Delighting the Mind.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Repository of Universal Clouds, shaped like a palace, resting on a perfume sea of various palaces, covered by clouds of lamps of all jewels, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called King of Mystic Powers of Supreme Awareness.

de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dra ba'i dbang po shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su yongs su gzhol ba'i 'od ces bya ba spos dang / rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ pad+mo la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtsho sems can gang chen mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ mu tig gi sbubs kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu thams cad kyi phreng ba bskyil ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs kyi sprin rab tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba dam pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Diamond Orb Adorned Floor sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Lotus Blossom Indra Net, with a world system called Everywhere Showing Reflections of the Ten Directions, resting on a lotus blossom adorned with jewels, with all kinds of scents, composed of the sounds of the light of knowledge of all Buddhas. At the bottom of this world system is a world called Jewel Light of the Ocean of Living Beings, shaped like a treasury of pearls, resting on a sea of garlands of all jewels, covered with clouds of crystals of the luster of water, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called All-Illumining Moon of Inconceivable Virtue.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes par snang ba'i tshon gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i 'od phyag bzang po rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi rgyan gyis spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams seng+ge'i khri'i tshul rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i 'od zer tshad med pa'i stobs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mtshan nyid kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad yongs su dag par ston pa'i rig byed mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me du ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang rnam par bral ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la mngon sum zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing dri ma med par sprul pa zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+mo snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kun gyi dbyings su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu gzigs pas bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'gro ba'i dpal shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shing mi'am ci'i rgyal po rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi mar me shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi chu bo tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas dge ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su sprul pa yangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi ze ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings grol ba'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i seng+ge'i khri ri bo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog mtha' yas par rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ shing dang / me tog dang / nags tshal gyi gzhi rgya mtshal rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa'i char 'debs pa'i mig 'phrul gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Wreath of Wonderful Fragrance; the Buddha there is called Banner of Infinite Power.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sphere of Subtle Light; the Buddha there is called Enlightening Wisdom with the Sound of the Light of the Cosmos.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Roaring Crystal Banner; the Buddha there is called Lotus Light with Beautiful Arms Always Hanging Down.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sphere of Extreme Stability; the Buddha there is called Light of the Sea of Nonregressive Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Light Beams; the Buddha is called Omniscient All-Conquerer.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lion Throne Illumining Everywhere; the Buddha is called Infinitely Powerful Enlightened Wisdom with Inconceivable Light.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Jewel Flames; the Buddha is called Pure Knowledge of All Things.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Immeasurable Lamp; the Buddha is called No Sign of Distress.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field. is a world called Hearing Buddha’s Voice; the Buddha is called Supremely Magnificent Natural Light.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Metamorphoses; the Buddha is called Golden Lotus Light.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Entering All Quarters; the Buddha is called Expanding Mind Observing the Cosmos.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Blazing Flames; the Buddha is called Light Flame Tree Kinnara King.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called All-Illumining Aromatic Light; the Buddha is called Skillfully Teaching Fragrant Lamp.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Wreath of Innumerable Flowers; the Buddha is called Everywhere Manifesting Buddhas’ Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Universal Purity of All Subtleties; the Buddha is called King of Psychic Powers Equanimous toward All Things.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sea of Golden Light; the Buddha is called Freely Manifesting Any Form in Any Place.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pearl Flower Treasury; the Buddha there is called Inconceivable Wisdom with Cosmic Jewel Light.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lofty Lion Throne of the Gods; the Buddha is called Light of Supreme Power.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Boundless Jewel Illumining Everywhere, square in shape, resting on a sea of flowered forests, covered by an imperial net raining diamonds everywhere, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Supreme Sound Illumining the Whole World.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang / spos kyi mdzod rab tu bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dang 'od thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i ze ba 'phags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Lotus Blossom Indra Net sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Treasury of Accumulated Precious Incense, with a world system called Array of All Virtues, composed of the sounds of the teachings of all Buddhas. At the bottom of this system is a world called Various Products, shaped like a thunderbolt, resting on various diamond mountain banners, covered by clouds of diamond light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is named Lotus Blossom Eyes.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na dga' ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang spro ba yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i ze ba sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med cing zhi ba'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dri ma med pa'i ye shes zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sprin stug po'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa'i gtso bo sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i tshal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs pa'i spyan gyis mthu rnam par phyung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs bzang po'i ze ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i grong khyer gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan nyi ma'i snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi phung po tshad med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'brug sgra'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rol pa brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i 'dab ma la brten pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rlung mnyam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po nyi ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba yongs su ston pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gsal ba sku'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sgra rdo rje rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi rgyan la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ stegs bu rgya mtsho'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ 'od zer gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzang pos mi bzhengs pa ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Gladdening Sound; its Buddha is Producer of Joy and Bliss.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Ornament Banner; its Buddha is Omniscience.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiant Cotton Flowers; its Buddha is Subtle Sound of Pure Calm.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Light of Transformation and Production; its Buddha is Moon of Knowledge in Pure Space.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Exquisite Arrays; its Buddha is Showing the Forms of Dense Clouds of the Sea of Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Subtle Sound of All Ornaments; its Buddha is Clouds of Joy.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lotus Pond; its Buddha is Banner of Renown.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of All Jewels; its Buddha is Expanding Observant Eye.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Flower; its Buddha is called Inexhaustible Indestructible Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lotus-Adorned City; its Buddha is Universal Light of Eyes like a Mine of Suns.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mountain Peak with Innumerable Trees; its Buddha is Thunder of All Truths.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sunlight; its Buddha is Demonstrating Infinite Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Resting on Lotus Leaves; its Buddha is Mountain of All Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Universally Supporting Atmosphere; its Buddha is Senses Shining like the Sun.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Evident Light; its Buddha is Body Glow Illumining Everywhere.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called All-Illuminating Diamond Reverberating with Fragrant Thunder; its Buddha is Form of Supreme Flowers Blooming.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Imperial Net Adornment, shaped like a balustrade, resting on a sea of all ornaments, covered by clouds of palaces of flames of light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is named Manifesting Clouds of Fearlessness.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang ldan pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing yongs su gsal ba zhes bya ba rdul thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa dri ma med pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ tsan+dan dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi gdugs sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thug pa med cing mnyam pa med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;

“Turning to the right of this Treasury of Accumulated Precious Incense sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Jewel Array, with a world system called Everywhere Undefiled, composed of sounds of spiritual metamorphoses of buddha-fields within all atoms. At the bottom of this system is a world called Pure Refinement, flat in shape, like a jewel, resting on a sea of light spheres of all jewels, covered by clouds of various sandalwood crystals and pearls, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Peerless Banner of Invincibility.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu 'bar ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo gros pad+mo mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi mtshan nyid 'khor lo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur yon tan rgya chen po rnam par grags pa'i 'od zer mi zad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba rab tu brtan pa rin po che'i snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po blta na dga' ba mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi me tog legs par bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs dang ye shes tshad med pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi tshon 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprul pa kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa shin tu grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'phrul pa las mngon par byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi mar me'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi sgron ma shin tu chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshul bzang po'i sgo sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gsung tshad med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ; de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi dra pa shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yongs su dag pa'i glong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nyi ma'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che pad+mo'i nags tshal yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rin po che ltar gzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal gyi 'od gzi brjid kyi rgyal bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang / nor bu shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu phra ba 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs gzhal du med pa'i dbyangs kun tu brjod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams brtan par bsgrubs pa phyogs thams cad du rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul nyi shu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po yan lag brgyad du rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa; rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongs su gsal ba'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Bright Beautiful Adornments; its Buddha is Lotus Mind King of Mystical Powers.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Banner of Rings of Subtle Forms; its Buddha is Endless Light of Universal Renown.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Marvelous Arrays of Crystals from Mines of Flames; its Buddha is Great Wisdom and Knowledge Delightful to All Who See or Hear.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Exquisite Flowers; its Buddha is Supreme Knowledge of Infinite Power.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Pure Particles; its Buddha is Transcending the Gods.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Scent of Metamorphic Productions of Universal Light; its Buddha is Scented Elephant of Unbreakable Power.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Vortex of Light; its Buddha is Good Reputation of Proven Logic.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sea of Jewel Necklaces; its Buddha is Incomparable Light Shining Everywhere.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Banner of Lamps of Beautiful Flowers; its Buddha is Lamp of Unhindered Wisdom with Ultimate Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Skillful Techniques; its Buddha is Transcendence of the Sun of Wisdom.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiant Light of Sandalwood Flowers; its Buddha is Sound of the Cosmos of Boundless Wisdom.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Imperial Net Banner; its Buddha is Lamplight Shining Far.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Flower Wreath; its Buddha is Light of the Cosmic Sun.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Great Awesome Radiance; its Buddha is Sound of the Cycles of Teaching of Boundless Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Lotus Pond Abode of Common Peace; its Buddha is Showing Knowledge Entering into the Inconceivable.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Level Ground; its Buddha is King of Light of Jewels of Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Mass of Aromatic Crystals; its Buddha is Exquisite Adornments of the Sea of Inexhaustible Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Subtle Light; its Buddha is Pervasive Sound of Incomparable Power.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Radiance of Adornments Solid and Stable Everywhere, octagonal in shape, resting on a sea of mind-king crystal globes, covered by clouds of drapes adorned by all precious stones, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Great Luminous Lamp of the Universal Eye.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rdo rje ltar brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis spyod pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang / sa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba; 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ mu tig bskyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu tig gi phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug phud rab tu snang ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Jewel Array sea of fragrant water, there is another sea of fragrant water, called Mass of Diamonds, with a world system called Cosmic Action, composed of the enunciation of the principles of the methods pertaining to all of the stages of development of enlightening beings. At the bottom of this system is a world called Radiance of Pure Light, shaped like a string of pearls, resting on a sea of necklaces of pearls of all colors, covered by clouds of crystals of light from the pearl topknots of enlightening beings, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Light of Supreme Virtue.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong bas khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng+ge'i khris brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa klu 'brug chen pos gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i khri pad+mo gnon pa'i lte ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi dbyangs pad+mo can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi phung po rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin gzi brjid bzang po'i rgyan ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba dang bde ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yang dag par gnas pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi nor bu'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blta na don yod cing dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sa sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro ba'i tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi spyod pa dag par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi sprin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i zla ba'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dam pa'i gser gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams klu'i grags pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par gzigs pa tha dad pa med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i go cha yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs kyi dpal rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi na bun gyi 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pas dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khon med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi dpal blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa pad+mos kun tu rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi ri rab la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad 'bar ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Wonderful Canopy; its Buddha is Mind Free in All Things.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Adorned Lion Throne; its Buddha is called Great Dragon Abyss.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Producing Diamond Thrones; its Buddha is called Ascending the Lotus Platform of a Lion Throne.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Supreme Lotus Sound; its Buddha is All-Enlightening Light of Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Good Customs; its Buddha is King of Sublime Light Holding the Earth.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sound of Happiness; its Buddha is King of the Lamp of Truth.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Jewel Treasury Indra’s Net; its Buddha is Not Seen in Vain.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Myriad Wonderful Mines; its Buddha is Flame Body Banner.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Wheel of Golden Light; its Buddha is Purifying the Acts of Living Beings.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Adornments of the Polar Mountains; its Buddha is Clouds of All Virtues Shining Everywhere.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Shapes of Myriad Trees; its Buddha is Awareness like a Pure Moon like a Jewel Flower.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called No Fear; its Buddha is Torch of Supreme Golden Light.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Dragon King Banner of Great Renown; its Buddha is Seeing All Things as Equal.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Displaying Crystal Colors; its Buddha is Sun of Metamorphic Production.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Array of Light Flame Lamps; its Buddha is Jewel Canopy Light Illumining All.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Fragrant Light Cloud; its Buddha is Contemplative Wisdom.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called No Enmity; its Buddha is Ocean of Energetic Supreme Intellect.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Banner of Lights of All Adornments; its Buddha is Sovereign King Able to Produce Delightful Lotuses Anywhere.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Hair-Curl Adornments, shaped like a half-moon, resting on a sea of crystal flowers from the polor mountain, covered by clouds of radiant diamonds of all kinds of ornaments, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. Its Buddha is called Pure Eye.

de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer rin po che'i shing thags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mar me'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ rnam par snang mdzad gzhan dang gzhan thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha ma dad pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i zla ba 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'jug pa/ rin po che'i rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa/ baidUr+ya dang / dngul gyi seng+ge'i khri sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ltar bdag po med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Turning to the right of this Diamond Mass sea of fragrant water, there is another sea of fragrant water, called Jewel Ramparts of Celestial Cities, with a world system called Lamp Flame Light, composed of the sounds of all impartial teachings. At the bottom of this system is a world called Ring of Jewel Moonlight Flowers, shaped like all kinds of ornaments, resting on a sea of flowers embellished with all kinds of jewels, covered by clouds of lion thrones the color of lapis lazuli, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field. The Buddha there is called Free Light of Sun and Moon.

rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs rmongs pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la thogs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Polar Mountain Jewel Light; its Buddha is Banner of Inexhaustuble Jewels of Truth.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Myriad Beautiful Light Beams; its Buddha is Great Mass of Flowers.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Crystal Light Flower; its Buddha is Most Independent of Humans.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Universal Sound; its Buddha is Omniscience Illumining Everywhere.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Great Tree Kinnara Sound; its Buddha is Independent Dragon with Infinite Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Boundless Pure Light; its Buddha is Light of Jewel Flowers of Virtue.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Supreme Sound; its Buddha is Array of All Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Decorated with Many Jewels; its Buddha is Jewel Flame Polar Mountain.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pure Wonderfully High Sound; its Buddha is Manifesting the Light of All Practices.
‘Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Perfume Canopy; its Buddha is Unobstructed Ocean of All Transcendent Ways.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lion Flower Net; its Buddha is Jewel Flame Banner.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lamp of Beautiful Diamond Flowers; its Buddha is Light of All Great Vows.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Stage of Illumination of All Things; its Buddha is Vast True Meaning of All Things.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Level Ornaments of Pearl Dust; its Buddha is Net of Light of Supreme Wisdom.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Lapis Lazuli Flowers; its Buddha is called Jewel Cluster Banner.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Sphere of Immeasurable Subtle Lights; its Buddha is Oceanic Treasury of Great Powerful Knowledge.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Clearly Seeing the Ten Directions; its Buddha is Banner of Pure Cultivation of All Virtues.
“Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, is a world called Pleasing Pure Sound, shaped like Buddha’s hand, resting on a sea of networks of jewel lights, covered by clouds of all adornments of enlightening beings’ bodies, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, all uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Unimpeded Light Illumining the Entire Cosmos.”

spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i lus bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i mig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i tshul rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur sprul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad+mo'i lo ma sprin stug po zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i spos kyi 'od 'phro bas kun tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gram bu 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de; de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi yul zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od dam pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo/ / de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis yul brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i lce rab tu snang ba shin tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/

The enlightening being Universally Good also said to the great congregation, “East of the Repository of Undefiled Flames sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Subtle Body of Mystic Emanation. In this sea is a system of worlds called Well-Arrayed Different Quarters. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Adamantine Eye Banner, with a world system called Bridges Adorning the Universe. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Beautiful Arrays of Various Lotuses, with a world system called Constantly Producing Emanations in the Ten Directions. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Gapless Diamond Wheel, with a world system called Dense Clouds of Jewel Lotus Stems. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Flames of Wonderful Fragrance Adorning Everywhere, with a world system called Vairocana’s Acts of Metamorphosis and Emanation. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Gold Banner of Jewel Dust, with a world system called Realm of the Buddhas’ Protection. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Blazing Lights of All Colors, with a world system called Supreme Light Shining Everywhere. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Realm of All Embellishments, with a world system called Jewel Flame Lamp.

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po shel zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste/
de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“There are as many such seas of fragrant waters as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields. The sea of fragrant water closest to the perimeter mountains is called Crystal Ground, with a world system called Always Radiating Light, composed of the sounds of the pure eons of the ocean of worlds.
At the bottom of this world system is a world called Banner of Pleasing Pure Light, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-field, uniformly pure; the Buddha there is called Energetic Wisdom with Supreme Concentration.

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams lus dam pa'i spos gya nom pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, level with the world Diamond Banner, the world on the tenth level of the world system of the sea of fragrant water in the center, is a world called Banner of Arrays of Fragrances, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, uniformly pure; the Buddha there is called Unobstructed Lamp of the Cosmos.
Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in three buddha-fields, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Radiant Treasury of Light; its Buddha is Unimpeded Light of Wisdom Pervading the Cosmos.
Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in seven buddha-fields, at the top of this world system, is a world called Supreme Body Fragrance, surrounded by as many worlds as atoms in twenty buddha-fields, uniformly pure. The Buddha there is called Flowers of the Branches of Enlightenment.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dri zhim po mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid bzang po dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi gsal zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba dang gzi brjid kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan mtha' yas pa la gzhol ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spos dang rin po che'i chos yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing yongs su gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan+dan shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi klong gi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho byin gyi rlabs kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'dal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho brgya byin gyi gdong dang lus shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig gi rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gnas shin tu mnyam par yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bai DUr+ya'i gram bu sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/

“Beyond the sea of fragrant water called Sphere of Inexhaustible Light is another sea of fragrant water, called Full of Subtle Light, with a world system called Everywhere Undefiled. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Canopy of Radiance, with a world system called Boundless Adornments. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Array of Exquisite Jewels, with a world system called Parametric Form of Aromatic Crystals. Next there is a sea of fragrant water called Producing the Sounds of Buddha’s Voice, with a world system called Well-Structured Array. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Polar Mountain Treasury of Banners of Fragrance, with a world system called Light Filling Everywhere. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Subtle Light of Sandalwood, with a world system called Wreath of Flower Radiance. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Atmospheric Power Sustaining, with a world system called Banner of Clouds of Aromatic Flames. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Adornments of the Body of the King of Gods, with a world system called Pearl Treasury. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Level and Pure, with a world system called Various Adornments of Lapis Lazuli Dust.

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol lho phyogs logs kyi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yangs ba'i zhing yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad bdud kyi 'khor yongs su 'dul ba'i gsung gi lhun can zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda' 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyis mchod pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ; de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sprin seng+ge'i stobs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba seng+ge'i rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“There are as many such seas of fragrant water as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields; the one closest to the surrounding mountains is called Beautiful Tree Blossoms, having a world system called Producing Vast Lands, composed of the sounds of all Buddhas vanquishing demons. At the bottom of this system is a world called Flaming Torch Banner; its Buddha is called Ocean of Wordly Virtues. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, parallel to the world Diamond Banner, is a world called Producing Jewels; its Buddha is Jewel Clouds of Invincible Power. Above this, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Raiment Banner; its Buddha is King of the Ocean of Omniscience. At the top of this world system is a world called Jewel Necklace Lion Light; its Buddha is called Lotus Banner of Skillful Transformation and Emanation.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan rnam par bres pa thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dam par rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gis rnam par snang ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan gyi rgyan dang dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i ze ba me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rin po che'i cod pan shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos kyis yun ring po nas bkab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig rnam par dag pa rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang po yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba'i sprin 'od zer rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nam mkha'i phyogs dang mnyam par rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che kun tu snang ba rnam par dmigs pa shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gser gyi me tog zla ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang / mu tig dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi dpal gyis kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'khor los bsgrubs pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sprul pa bzang po 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/

“Beyond the sea of fragrant water called Diamond Flame Light is another sea of fragrant water, called Banner Brightly Decorated with All Adornments, with a world system called Adorned by Pure Actions. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Sea of Radiance of Flowers of All Jewels, with a world system called Adorned by Virtuous Characteristics. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Lotus Blooming, with a world system called Crown Jewels of Enlightening Beings. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Raiment of Exquisite Jewels, with a world system called Pure Pearl Orbs. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Lovely Flowers Illumining Everywhere, with a world system called Radiance of Clouds of a Hundred Lights. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Great Light Pervading Space, with a world system called Jewel Light Shining Everywhere. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Banner Adorned with Beautiful Flowers, with a world system called Gold Moon Eye Necklace. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Fragrant Ocean Treasury of Pearls, with a world system called Buddha Halo. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Jewel Disc Light, with a world system called Light Easily Displaying the Realm of Buddhahood.

“There are as many such seas of fragrant waters as atoms in an unspeakable number of buddha-fields; the one nearest to the surrounding mountains is called Boundless Discs Adorning the Floor. It has a world system called Distinctions of Innumerable Regions, composed of the sounds of the languages of all countries. At the bottom of the system is a world called Diamond Flower Canopy; the Buddha there is called Universal Sound of Light of Inexhaustible Features. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, is a world, parallel to the world Diamond Banner, called Banner Producing Precious Raiment; its Buddha is called Great Power of Clouds of Virtue. Above this, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Beautiful Array of Implements of Myriad Jewels; its Buddha is Ocean of Supreme Wisdom. At the top of this world system is a world called Banner of Raiment of Sunlight; its Buddha is Lotus Cloud of the Sun of Knowledge.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+d+ra nI las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhung las lha ma yin gyi gnas shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer chu'i shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho seng+ge'i rin po ches bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che thams cad kyi phyogs khyab par byed pa rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog gi sprin gyi gnas 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ri bo'i spo la dkyil 'khor rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang / sgo pad+mo rnam par bkram pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings bde ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me tshul bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sprul pa'i phyogs rnam par lta zhing kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs thams cad du snang bas legs pa rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i phung pos shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od rab tu 'gyed pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rlung chags pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dag 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dang / stegs bu'i rgyud ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/

“Beyond the Sapphire Array sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Titan Palace, with a world system called Supported by Scented Light. Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Jewel Lion Array, with a world system called Revealing All the Jewels in All Regions. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Palace Color Light Clouds, with a world system called Beautiful Array of Jewel Globes. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Producing Gigantic Lotuses, with a world system called Beautiful Ornaments Lighting Up the Universe. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Wonderful Eye of Lamp Flames, with a world system called Overseeing All Transformations in the Ten Directions. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Sphere of Inconceivable Adornments, with a world system called Universal Renown of the Light of the Ten Directions. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Jewel Heap Adornment, with a world system called Lamp Light Radiance. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Pure Jewel Light, with a world system called Unobstructed Wind. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Balustrade Draped with Precious Raiment, with a world system called Light of Buddha’s Body.

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa rab tu gnon pa'i sgra'i lhun can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“There are as many such seas as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields. Closest to the surrounding mountains is a sea of fragrant water called Banner Decorated with Trees, with a world system called Resting Peacefully in the Imperial Net, composed of the sounds of the stages of knowledge of all enlightening beings. At the bottom of this system is a world called Golden; its Buddha is called Supremely Majestic Light of Aromatic Flames.
bam po bcu gcig pa/

de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal kun tu ston cing bsgribs pa med par rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug zil gyis mi non pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i 'od kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, parallel to the world Diamond Banner, is a world called Crystal Tree Flowers; its Buddha is called Unhindered Appearance Anywhere. Above this, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Beautiful Adornments of Lapis Lazuli; its Buddha is called Stable Intellect Mastering All Principles. At the top of this world system is a world called Sublime Array of Pure Sounds; the Buddha is called King of Light of Lotuses Blooming.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor lo brtan par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi sprul pa'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing la yongs su 'du ba rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa la rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang nor bu'i nyi ma sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yongs su gzhol bar rnam par dmigs pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spyod pa kun nas rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbyangs zab mo mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snying po dang ldan zhing shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha mi dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su dag pa'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan+dan gyi dbyangs shin tu rnam par phye ba'i stegs bu'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi stobs kun tu snang ba yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /

“Beyond the sea of fragrant water Diamond Orb Adorned Floor is another sea of fragrant water, called Realm of Magical Production of Lotus Blossoms, with a world system called Equality and Justice in the Land.
Next to that is a sea of fragrant water called Crystal Light, with a world system called No Confusion throughout the Universe.
Next is a sea of fragrant water called Sun Crystal of Many Wonderful Scents, with a world system called Appearing in All Quarters.
Next is a sea of fragrant water called Eternally Admitting Jewel Rivers, with a world system called Sounds of Buddha’s Speech Carried Out Everywhere.
Next is a sea of fragrant water called Boundless Deep Wondrous Sound, with a world system called Boundless Distinctions in Location.
Next is a sea of fragrant water called Solid Mass, with a world system called Distinctions in Innumerable Places. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Pure Sound, with a world system called Everywhere Pure Adornments. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Sandalwood Balustrade Treasury of Sound, with a world system called Egregious Banner. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Adornment of Light of Diamonds of Wonderful Fragrance, with a world system called Power of Light Appearing Everywhere.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dbang po mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dngul gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud yongs su gsal bar kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho baiDAr+ya'i spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho phyogs kun tu gzi brjid kyis rgyal ba'i phung po 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba yod de; de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs rnam par phye bar 'phrul ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser gyi rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal po'i dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rdo rje'i rtse mo zhing gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tha dad pa med pa'i sprin 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gtsug ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i me tog zad mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyis gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od mtha' yas pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgya che zhing gser ltar yongs su dag pa/ grags pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi tshon du bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig yor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud las kyis kun tu brgyan cing rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sgra dbyangs zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu brgyus pa la mngon du lta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/

“Beyond the Lotus Blossom Indra Net sea of fragrant water is another sea of fragrant water, called Beautiful Ornaments of Silver Lotus Flowers, with a world system called Universal Action. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Cloud of Intense Radiance of Lapis Lazuli Bamboo, with a world system called Everywhere Producing the Sounds of All Quarters. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Mass of Light Flames of the Ten Directions, with a world system called Always Producing Metamorphic Displays Distributed Throughout the Ten Directions. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Gold-Producing Crystal Banner, with a world system called Form of Diamond Banners. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Great Equal Adornments, with a world system called Circle of Bravery. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Endless Light of Jewel Flower Groves, with a world system called Boundless Pure Light. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Gold Banner, with a world system called Expounding Mysteries. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Light Beams Shining Everywhere, with a world system called Everywhere Adorned. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Tranquil Sound, with a world system called Appearing Hanging Down.

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba stug po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba/ snying po byang chub thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so/ / de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par snang ba rdo rje'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog ut+pal dang dpal gyi be'u zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams rdo rje ltar sra ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi non par mngon par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“There are as many such seas as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields. The one closest to the surrounding mountains is called Intense Flame Cloud Banner; its world system, called Array of All Lights, is composed of the sounds of the beings assembled at the enlightenment sites of all Buddhas. At the bottom of this system is a world called Pure Eye Adornment; its Buddha is called Diamond Moon Illumining the Ten Directions. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, parallel to the world Diamond Banner, is a world called Qualities of Lotus Blossoms, with a Buddha called Greatly Energetic Well-Aware Mind. Above this, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Dense Arrays of Diamonds, with a Buddha called Shala King Banner. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in seven buddha-fields, is a world called Pure Ocean Adornments, with a Buddha called Incomparable Virtue which None Can Conquer.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi mdzod shin tu bsags pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od snang bas rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grags pa dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che tshad med pa'i med pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bu rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thogs pa med par kun tu snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan+dan gyi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i phyogs su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i rgyal po'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la zhing gi 'khor rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor kun na rdo rje me tog gi 'byung gnas yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par phye ba bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu'i yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par rig pa chags pa med pas sangs rgyas lta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi rin po che'i phreng bas bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud blo gros dge ba mtha' yas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba rab tu gnas so; ; de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / smon lam gyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ /

“Beyond the sea of fragrant water Treasury of Accumulated Precious Incense is another sea of fragrant water, called Light of All Jewels Shining Everywhere, with a world system called Adornment of Undefiled Reputation. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Flowers of Many Jewels Blooming, with a world system called Form of Space. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Tent of Glory Shining Everywhere, with a world system called Everywhere Adorned with Unimpeded Light. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Sandalwood Tree Blossoms, with a world system called Whirl Appearing Everywhere. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Producing Jewels of Exquisite Colors, with a world system called Supreme Banner Traveling Everywhere. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Everywhere Producing Diamond Flowers, with a world system called Displaying Inconceivable Adornments. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Mind King Crystal Wheel Ornaments, with a world system called Manifesting the Unobstructed Light of Buddha. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Necklace of Masses of Jewels, with a world system called Clearing Away Doubt. Next is a sea of fragrant water called Everywhere Adorned with Rings of Pearls, with a world system called Flowing from the Vows of the Buddhas.

de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun tu sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgor rab tu 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ngo/ / de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bas gsol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ; de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par 'phags pa'i sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams stobs bcu'i rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par byung ba'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

“There are as many such seas as atoms in unspeakably many buddha-fields. The one closest to the surrounding mountains is called Circle of Jewel Mines, with a world system, called Universal Sound Banner, composed of the sounds of enunciation of ways of entry into omniscience. At the bottom of this world system is a world called Flower Pistil Flames, with a Buddha called Energetic Generosity. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in ten buddha-fields, parallel to the world Diamond Banner, is a world called Lotus Light Banner, with a Buddha called Supreme Mind King with All Virtues. Above this, past as many worlds as atoms in three buddha-fields, parallel to the world Endurance, is a world called Ten Directions Adorned, with a Buddha called King Skillfully Manifesting Innumerable Virtuous Qualities. At the top of this world system is a world called Crystal Fragrance Mountain Banner, with a Buddha called Vast Benevolent Eyes Removing Doubt.

spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po ches mthun par rnam par brgyan pa de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od zer gyi mdzod kyi ri bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha'i spyin yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing bsgribs pa med par rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i pad+mo 'dab ma stug po rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus kyi rgyan dam pa'i mar me zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang dag par bsgrubs pa shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i ze ba byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shin tu gtsang ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud lus dam pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs kyi phung po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid dag cing yangs pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in+d+ra nI la'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ skar mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ / de dang 'dabs
